1828  <li>Fixed a bug (#2590) - <a class="reference internal" href="general/common_functions.html"><span class="doc">Common function</span></a> <a class="reference internal" href="general/errors.html#log_message" title="log_message"><code class="xref php php-func docutils literal"><span class="pre">log_message()</span></code></a> didn’t actually cache the <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">CI_Log</span></code> class instance.</li>
1829  <li>Fixed a bug (#2609) - <a class="reference internal" href="general/common_functions.html"><span class="doc">Common function</span></a> <code class="xref php php-func docutils literal"><span class="pre">get_config()</span></code> optional argument was only effective on first function call. Also, it can now add items, in addition to updating existing items.</li>
1830  <li>Fixed a bug in the ‘postgre’ <a class="reference internal" href="database/index.html"><span class="doc">database</span></a> driver where the connection ID wasn’t passed to <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">pg_escape_string()</span></code>.</li>
1831  <li>Fixed a bug (#33) - Script execution was terminated when an invalid cookie key was encountered.</li>
1832  <li>Fixed a bug (#2691) - nested <a class="reference internal" href="database/index.html"><span class="doc">database</span></a> transactions could end in a deadlock when an error is encountered with <em>db_debug</em> set to TRUE.</li>
1833  <li>Fixed a bug (#2515) - <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">_exception_handler()</span></code> used to send the 200 “OK” HTTP status code and didn’t stop script exection even on fatal errors.</li>
1834  <li>Fixed a bug - Redis <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/caching.html"><span class="doc">Caching</span></a> driver didn’t handle connection failures properly.</li>
1835  <li>Fixed a bug (#2756) - <a class="reference internal" href="database/index.html"><span class="doc">Database Class</span></a> executed the MySQL-specific <cite>SET SESSION sql_mode</cite> query for all drivers when the ‘stricton’ option is set.</li>
1836  <li>Fixed a bug (#2579) - <a class="reference internal" href="database/query_builder.html"><span class="doc">Query Builder</span></a> “no escape” functionality didn’t work properly with query cache.</li>
1837  <li>Fixed a bug (#2237) - <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/parser.html"><span class="doc">Parser Library</span></a> failed if the same tag pair is used more than once within a template.</li>
1838  <li>Fixed a bug (#2143) - <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/form_validation.html"><span class="doc">Form Validation Library</span></a> didn’t check for rule groups named in a <em>controller/method</em> manner when trying to load from a config file.</li>
1839  <li>Fixed a bug (#2762) - <a class="reference internal" href="general/hooks.html"><span class="doc">Hooks Class</span></a> didn’t properly check if the called class/function exists.</li>
1840  <li>Fixed a bug (#148) - <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/input.html"><span class="doc">Input Library</span></a> internal method <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">_clean_input_data()</span></code> assumed that it data is URL-encoded, stripping certain character sequences from it.</li>
1841  <li>Fixed a bug (#346) - with <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">$config['global_xss_filtering']</span></code> turned on, the <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">$_GET</span></code>, <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">$_POST</span></code>, <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">$_COOKIE</span></code> and <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">$_SERVER</span></code> superglobals were overwritten during initialization time, resulting in XSS filtering being either performed twice or there was no possible way to get the original data, even though options for this do exist.</li>
1842  <li>Fixed an edge case (#555) - <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/user_agent.html"><span class="doc">User Agent Library</span></a> reported an incorrect version Opera 10+ due to a non-standard user-agent string.</li>
1843  <li>Fixed a bug (#133) - <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/text_helper.html"><span class="doc">Text Helper</span></a> <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/text_helper.html#ascii_to_entities" title="ascii_to_entities"><code class="xref php php-func docutils literal"><span class="pre">ascii_to_entities()</span></code></a> stripped the last character if it happens to be in the extended ASCII group.</li>
1844  <li>Fixed a bug (#2822) - <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">fwrite()</span></code> was used incorrectly throughout the whole framework, allowing incomplete writes when writing to a network stream and possibly a few other edge cases.</li>
1845  <li>Fixed a bug where <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/user_agent.html"><span class="doc">User Agent Library</span></a> methods <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">accept_charset()</span></code> and <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">accept_lang()</span></code> didn’t properly parse HTTP headers that contain spaces.</li>
1846  <li>Fixed a bug where <em>default_controller</em> was called instad of triggering a 404 error if the current route is in a controller directory.</li>
1847  <li>Fixed a bug (#2737) - <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/xmlrpc.html"><span class="doc">XML-RPC Library</span></a> used objects as array keys, which triggered E_NOTICE messages.</li>
1848  <li>Fixed a bug (#2771) - <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/security.html"><span class="doc">Security Library</span></a> method <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">xss_clean()</span></code> didn’t take into account HTML5 entities.</li>
1849  <li>Fixed a bug (#2856) - ODBC method <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">affected_rows()</span></code> passed an incorrect value to <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">odbc_num_rows()</span></code>.</li>
1850  <li>Fixed a bug (#43) <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/image_lib.html"><span class="doc">Image Manipulation Library</span></a> method <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">text_watermark()</span></code> didn’t properly determine watermark placement.</li>
1851  <li>Fixed a bug where <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/table.html"><span class="doc">HTML Table Library</span></a> ignored its <em>auto_heading</em> setting if headings were not already set.</li>
1852  <li>Fixed a bug (#2364) - <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/pagination.html"><span class="doc">Pagination Library</span></a> appended the query string (if used) multiple times when there are successive calls to <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">create_links()</span></code> with no <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">initialize()</span></code> in between them.</li>
1853  <li>Partially fixed a bug (#261) - UTF-8 class method <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">clean_string()</span></code> generating log messages and/or not producing the desired result due to an upstream bug in iconv.</li>
1854  <li>Fixed a bug where <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">CI_Xmlrpcs::parseRequest()</span></code> could fail if <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">$HTTP_RAW_POST_DATA</span></code> is not populated.</li>
1855  <li>Fixed a bug in <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/zip.html"><span class="doc">Zip Library</span></a> internal method <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">_get_mod_time()</span></code> where it was not parsing result returned by <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">filemtime()</span></code>.</li>
1856  <li>Fixed a bug (#3161) - <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/caching.html"><span class="doc">Cache Library</span></a> methods <cite>increment()</cite>, <cite>decrement()</cite> didn’t auto-create non-existent items when using redis and/or file storage.</li>
1857  <li>Fixed a bug (#3189) - <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/parser.html"><span class="doc">Parser Library</span></a> used double replacement on <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">key-&gt;value</span></code> pairs, exposing a potential template injection vulnerability.</li>
1858  <li>Fixed a bug (#3573) - <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/email.html"><span class="doc">Email Library</span></a> violated <a class="reference external" href="https://tools.ietf.org/rfc/rfc5321.txt">RFC5321</a> by sending ‘localhost.localdomain’ as a hostname.</li>
1859  <li>Fixed a bug (#3572) - <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">CI_Security::_remove_evil_attributes()</span></code> failed for large-sized inputs due to <em>pcre.backtrack_limit</em> and didn’t properly match HTML tags.</li>
1860  </ul>
1861  </div>
1862  </div>
1863  <div class="section" id="version-2-2-3">
1864  <h2>Version 2.2.3<a class="headerlink" href="#version-2-2-3" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
1865  <p>Release Date: July 14, 2015</p>
1866  <ul class="simple">
1867  <li>Security<ul>
1868  <li>Removed a fallback to <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">mysql_escape_string()</span></code> in the ‘mysql’ database driver (<code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">escape_str()</span></code> method) when there’s no active database connection.</li>
1869  </ul>
1870  </li>
1871  </ul>
1872  </div>
1873  <div class="section" id="version-2-2-2">
1874  <h2>Version 2.2.2<a class="headerlink" href="#version-2-2-2" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
1875  <p>Release Date: April 15, 2015</p>
1876  <ul class="simple">
1877  <li>General Changes<ul>
1878  <li>Added HTTP “Host” header character validation to prevent cache poisoning attacks when <em>base_url</em> auto-detection is used.</li>
1879  <li>Added <em>FSCommand</em> and <em>seekSegmentTime</em> to the “evil attributes” list in <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">CI_Security::xss_clean()</span></code>.</li>
1880  </ul>
1881  </li>
1882  </ul>
1883  <div class="section" id="bug-fixes-for-2-2-2">
1884  <h3>Bug fixes for 2.2.2<a class="headerlink" href="#bug-fixes-for-2-2-2" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h3>
1885  <ul class="simple">
1886  <li>Fixed a bug (#3665) - <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">CI_Security::entity_decode()</span></code> triggered warnings under some circumstances.</li>
1887  </ul>
1888  </div>
1889  </div>
1890  <div class="section" id="version-2-2-1">
1891  <h2>Version 2.2.1<a class="headerlink" href="#version-2-2-1" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
1892  <p>Release Date: January 22, 2015</p>
1893  <ul class="simple">
1894  <li>General Changes<ul>
1895  <li>Improved security in <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">xss_clean()</span></code>.</li>
1896  <li>Updated timezones in <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/date_helper.html"><span class="doc">Date Helper</span></a>.</li>
1897  </ul>
1898  </li>
1899  </ul>
1900  <div class="section" id="bug-fixes-for-2-2-1">
1901  <h3>Bug fixes for 2.2.1<a class="headerlink" href="#bug-fixes-for-2-2-1" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h3>
1902  <ul class="simple">
1903  <li>Fixed a bug (#3094) - Internal method <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">CI_Input::_clean_input_data()</span></code> breaks encrypted session cookies.</li>
1904  <li>Fixed a bug (#2268) - <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/security.html"><span class="doc">Security Library</span></a> method <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">xss_clean()</span></code> didn’t properly match JavaScript events.</li>
1905  <li>Fixed a bug (#3309) - <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/security.html"><span class="doc">Security Library</span></a> method <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">xss_clean()</span></code> used an overly-invasive pattern to strip JS event handlers.</li>
1906  <li>Fixed a bug (#2771) - <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/security.html"><span class="doc">Security Library</span></a> method <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">xss_clean()</span></code> didn’t take into account HTML5 entities.</li>
1907  <li>Fixed a bug (#73) - <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/security.html"><span class="doc">Security Library</span></a> method <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">sanitize_filename()</span></code> could be tricked by an XSS attack.</li>
1908  <li>Fixed a bug (#2681) - <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/security.html"><span class="doc">Security Library</span></a> method <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">entity_decode()</span></code> used the <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">PREG_REPLACE_EVAL</span></code> flag, which is deprecated since PHP 5.5.</li>
1909  <li>Fixed a bug (#3302) - Internal function <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">get_config()</span></code> triggered an E_NOTICE message on PHP 5.6.</li>
1910  <li>Fixed a bug (#2508) - <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/config.html"><span class="doc">Config Library</span></a> didn’t properly detect if the current request is via HTTPS.</li>
1911  <li>Fixed a bug (#3314) - SQLSRV <a class="reference internal" href="database/index.html"><span class="doc">Database driver</span></a>’s method <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">count_all()</span></code> didn’t escape the supplied table name.</li>
1912  <li>Fixed a bug (#3404) - MySQLi <a class="reference internal" href="database/index.html"><span class="doc">Database driver</span></a>’s method <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">escape_str()</span></code> had a wrong fallback to <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">mysql_escape_string()</span></code> when there was no active connection.</li>
1913  <li>Fixed a bug in the <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/sessions.html"><span class="doc">Session Library</span></a> where session ID regeneration occurred during AJAX requests.</li>
1914  </ul>
1915  </div>
1916  </div>
1917  <div class="section" id="version-2-2-0">
1918  <h2>Version 2.2.0<a class="headerlink" href="#version-2-2-0" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
1919  <p>Release Date: June 2, 2014</p>
1920  <ul class="simple">
1921  <li>General Changes<ul>
1922  <li>Security: <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/encrypt.html"><span class="doc">Encrypt Library</span></a> method <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">xor_encode()</span></code> has been removed. The Encrypt Class now requires the Mcrypt extension to be installed.</li>
1923  <li>Security: The <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/sessions.html"><span class="doc">Session Library</span></a> now uses HMAC authentication instead of a simple MD5 checksum.</li>
1924  </ul>
1925  </li>
1926  </ul>
1927  <div class="section" id="bug-fixes-for-2-2-0">
1928  <h3>Bug fixes for 2.2.0<a class="headerlink" href="#bug-fixes-for-2-2-0" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h3>
1929  <ul class="simple">
1930  <li>Fixed an edge case (#2583) in the <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/email.html"><span class="doc">Email Library</span></a> where <cite>Suhosin &lt;http://www.hardened-php.net/suhosin/&gt;</cite> blocked messages sent via <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">mail()</span></code> due to trailing newspaces in headers.</li>
1931  <li>Fixed a bug (#696) - make <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">oci_execute()</span></code> calls inside <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">num_rows()</span></code> non-committing, since they are only there to reset which row is next in line for oci_fetch calls and thus don’t need to be committed.</li>
1932  <li>Fixed a bug (#2689) - <a class="reference internal" href="database/forge.html"><span class="doc">Database Force</span></a> methods <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">create_table()</span></code>, <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">drop_table()</span></code> and <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">rename_table()</span></code> produced broken SQL for tge ‘sqlsrv’ driver.</li>
1933  <li>Fixed a bug (#2427) - PDO <a class="reference internal" href="database/index.html"><span class="doc">Database driver</span></a> didn’t properly check for query failures.</li>
1934  <li>Fixed a bug in the <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/sessions.html"><span class="doc">Session Library</span></a> where authentication was not performed for encrypted cookies.</li>
1935  </ul>
1936  </div>
1937  </div>
1938  <div class="section" id="version-2-1-4">

1941  <ul class="simple">
1942  <li>General Changes<ul>
1943  <li>Improved security in <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">xss_clean()</span></code>.</li>
1944  </ul>
1945  </li>
1946  </ul>
1947  <div class="section" id="bug-fixes-for-2-1-4">
1948  <h3>Bug fixes for 2.1.4<a class="headerlink" href="#bug-fixes-for-2-1-4" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h3>
1949  <ul class="simple">
1950  <li>Fixed a bug (#1936) - <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/migration.html"><span class="doc">Migration Library</span></a> method <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">latest()</span></code> had a typo when retrieving language values.</li>
1951  <li>Fixed a bug (#2021) - <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/migration.html"><span class="doc">Migration Library</span></a> configuration file was mistakenly using Windows style line feeds.</li>
1952  <li>Fixed a bug (#1273) - <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">E_NOTICE</span></code> being generated by <a class="reference internal" href="database/query_builder.html"><span class="doc">Query Builder</span></a>’s <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">set_update_batch()</span></code> method.</li>
1953  <li>Fixed a bug (#2337) - <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/email.html"><span class="doc">Email Library</span></a> method <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">print_debugger()</span></code> didn’t apply <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">htmlspecialchars()</span></code> to headers.</li>
1954  </ul>
1955  </div>
1956  </div>
1957  <div class="section" id="version-2-1-3">
1958  <h2>Version 2.1.3<a class="headerlink" href="#version-2-1-3" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
1959  <p>Release Date: October 8, 2012</p>
1960  <ul class="simple">
1961  <li>Core<ul>
1962  <li><a class="reference internal" href="general/common_functions.html"><span class="doc">Common function</span></a> <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">is_loaded()</span></code> now returns a reference.</li>
1963  </ul>
1964  </li>
1965  </ul>
1966  <div class="section" id="bug-fixes-for-2-1-3">
1967  <h3>Bug fixes for 2.1.3<a class="headerlink" href="#bug-fixes-for-2-1-3" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h3>
1968  <ul class="simple">
1969  <li>Fixed a bug (#1543) - File-based <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/caching.html"><span class="doc">Caching</span></a> method <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">get_metadata()</span></code> used a non-existent array key to look for the TTL value.</li>
1970  <li>Fixed a bug (#1314) - <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/sessions.html"><span class="doc">Session Library</span></a> method <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">sess_destroy()</span></code> didn’t destroy the userdata array.</li>
1971  <li>Fixed a bug (#804) - <a class="reference internal" href="general/profiling.html"><span class="doc">Profiler library</span></a> was trying to handle objects as strings in some cases, resulting in <em>E_WARNING</em> messages being issued by <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">htmlspecialchars()</span></code>.</li>
1972  <li>Fixed a bug (#1699) - <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/migration.html"><span class="doc">Migration Library</span></a> ignored the <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">$config['migration_path']</span></code> setting.</li>
1973  <li>Fixed a bug (#227) - <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/input.html"><span class="doc">Input Library</span></a> allowed unconditional spoofing of HTTP clients’ IP addresses through the <em>HTTP_CLIENT_IP</em> header.</li>
1974  <li>Fixed a bug (#907) - <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/input.html"><span class="doc">Input Library</span></a> ignored <em>HTTP_X_CLUSTER_CLIENT_IP</em> and <em>HTTP_X_CLIENT_IP</em> headers when checking for proxies.</li>
1975  <li>Fixed a bug (#940) - <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">csrf_verify()</span></code> used to set the CSRF cookie while processing a POST request with no actual POST data, which resulted in validating a request that should be considered invalid.</li>
1976  <li>Fixed a bug (#499) - <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/security.html"><span class="doc">Security Library</span></a> where a CSRF cookie was created even if <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">$config['csrf_protection']</span></code> is set to FALSE.</li>
1977  <li>Fixed a bug (#1715) - <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/input.html"><span class="doc">Input Library</span></a> triggered <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">csrf_verify()</span></code> on CLI requests.</li>
1978  <li>Fixed a bug (#751) - <a class="reference internal" href="database/query_builder.html"><span class="doc">Query Builder</span></a> didn’t properly handle cached field escaping overrides.</li>
1979  <li>Fixed a bug (#2004) - <a class="reference internal" href="database/query_builder.html"><span class="doc">Query Builder</span></a> didn’t properly merge cached calls with non-cache ones.</li>
1980  </ul>
1981  </div>
1982  </div>

1992  </div>
1993  <div class="section" id="version-2-1-1">
1994  <h2>Version 2.1.1<a class="headerlink" href="#version-2-1-1" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
1995  <p>Release Date: June 12, 2012</p>
1996  <ul class="simple">
1997  <li>General Changes<ul>
1998  <li>Fixed support for docx, xlsx files in mimes.php.</li>
1999  </ul>
2000  </li>
2001  <li>Libraries<ul>
2002  <li>Further improved MIME type detection in the <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/file_uploading.html"><span class="doc">File Uploading Library</span></a>.</li>
2003  <li>Added support for IPv6 to the <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/input.html"><span class="doc">Input Library</span></a>.</li>
2004  <li>Added support for the IP format parameter to the <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/form_validation.html"><span class="doc">Form Validation Library</span></a>.</li>
2005  </ul>
2006  </li>
2007  <li>Helpers<ul>
2008  <li><code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">url_title()</span></code> performance and output improved. You can now use any string as the word delimiter, but ‘dash’ and ‘underscore’ are still supported.</li>
2009  </ul>
2010  </li>
2011  </ul>
2012  <div class="section" id="bug-fixes-for-2-1-1">
2013  <h3>Bug fixes for 2.1.1<a class="headerlink" href="#bug-fixes-for-2-1-1" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h3>
2014  <ul class="simple">
2015  <li>Fixed a bug (#697) - A wrong array key was used in the <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/file_uploading.html"><span class="doc">File Uploading Library</span></a> to check for mime-types.</li>
2016  <li>Fixed a bug - <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">form_open()</span></code> compared $action against <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">site_url()</span></code> instead of <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">base_url()</span></code>.</li>
2017  <li>Fixed a bug - <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">CI_Upload::_file_mime_type()</span></code> could’ve failed if <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">mime_content_type()</span></code> is used for the detection and returns FALSE.</li>
2018  <li>Fixed a bug (#538) - Windows paths were ignored when using the <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/image_lib.html"><span class="doc">Image Manipulation Library</span></a> to create a new file.</li>
2019  <li>Fixed a bug - When database caching was enabled, $this-&gt;db-&gt;query() checked the cache before binding variables which resulted in cached queries never being found.</li>
2020  <li>Fixed a bug - CSRF cookie value was allowed to be any (non-empty) string before being written to the output, making code injection a risk.</li>
2021  <li>Fixed a bug (#726) - PDO put a ‘dbname’ argument in its connection string regardless of the database platform in use, which made it impossible to use SQLite.</li>
2022  <li>Fixed a bug - <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">CI_DB_pdo_driver::num_rows()</span></code> was not returning properly value with SELECT queries, cause it was relying on <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">PDOStatement::rowCount()</span></code>.</li>
2023  <li>Fixed a bug (#1059) - <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">CI_Image_lib::clear()</span></code> was not correctly clearing all necessary object properties, namely width and height.</li>
2024  </ul>
2025  </div>
2026  </div>
2027  <div class="section" id="version-2-1-0">
2028  <h2>Version 2.1.0<a class="headerlink" href="#version-2-1-0" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
2029  <p>Release Date: November 14, 2011</p>
2030  <ul class="simple">
2031  <li>General Changes<ul>
2032  <li>Callback validation rules can now accept parameters like any other
2033  validation rule.</li>
2034  <li>Added html_escape() to <a class="reference internal" href="general/common_functions.html"><span class="doc">Common
2035  functions</span></a> to escape HTML output
2036  for preventing XSS.</li>
2037  </ul>
2038  </li>
2039  <li>Helpers<ul>
2040  <li>Added increment_string() to <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/string_helper.html"><span class="doc">String
2041  Helper</span></a> to turn “foo” into “foo-1”
2042  or “foo-1” into “foo-2”.</li>
2043  <li>Altered form helper - made action on form_open_multipart helper
2044  function call optional. Fixes (#65)</li>
2045  <li>url_title() will now trim extra dashes from beginning and end.</li>
2046  <li>Improved speed of <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/string_helper.html"><span class="doc">String Helper</span></a>’s random_string() method</li>
2047  </ul>
2048  </li>
2049  <li>Database<ul>
2050  <li>Added a <a class="reference external" href="http://www.cubrid.org/">CUBRID</a> driver to the <a class="reference internal" href="database/index.html"><span class="doc">Database
2051  Driver</span></a>. Thanks to the CUBRID team for
2052  supplying this patch.</li>
2053  <li>Added a PDO driver to the <a class="reference internal" href="database/index.html"><span class="doc">Database Driver</span></a>.</li>
2054  <li>Typecast limit and offset in the <a class="reference internal" href="database/queries.html"><span class="doc">Database
2055  Driver</span></a> to integers to avoid possible
2056  injection.</li>
2057  <li>Added additional option ‘none’ for the optional third argument for
2058  $this-&gt;db-&gt;like() in the <a class="reference internal" href="database/query_builder.html"><span class="doc">Database
2059  Driver</span></a>.</li>
2060  <li>Added $this-&gt;db-&gt;insert_batch() support to the OCI8 (Oracle) driver.</li>
2061  <li>Added failover if the main connections in the config should fail</li>
2062  </ul>
2063  </li>
2064  <li>Libraries<ul>
2065  <li>Changed <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">$this-&gt;cart-&gt;insert()</span></code> in the <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/cart.html"><span class="doc">Cart
2066  Library</span></a> to return the Row ID if a single
2067  item was inserted successfully.</li>
2068  <li>Added support to set an optional parameter in your callback rules
2069  of validation using the <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/form_validation.html"><span class="doc">Form Validation
2070  Library</span></a>.</li>
2071  <li>Added a <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/migration.html"><span class="doc">Migration library</span></a> to assist with applying
2072  incremental updates to your database schema.</li>
2073  <li>Driver children can be located in any package path.</li>
2074  <li>Added max_filename_increment config setting for Upload library.</li>
2075  <li>Added <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">is_unique</span></code> to the <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/form_validation.html"><span class="doc">Form Validation library</span></a>.</li>
2076  <li>Added $config[‘use_page_numbers’] to the <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/pagination.html"><span class="doc">Pagination library</span></a>, which enables real page numbers in the URI.</li>
2077  <li>Added TLS and SSL Encryption for SMTP.</li>
2078  </ul>
2079  </li>
2080  <li>Core<ul>
2081  <li>Changed private functions in CI_URI to protected so MY_URI can
2082  override them.</li>
2083  <li>Removed CI_CORE boolean constant from CodeIgniter.php (no longer Reactor and Core versions).</li>
2084  </ul>
2085  </li>
2086  </ul>
2087  <div class="section" id="bug-fixes-for-2-1-0">
2088  <h3>Bug fixes for 2.1.0<a class="headerlink" href="#bug-fixes-for-2-1-0" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h3>
2089  <ul class="simple">
2090  <li>Fixed #378 Robots identified as regular browsers by the User Agent
2091  class.</li>
2092  <li>If a config class was loaded first then a library with the same name
2093  is loaded, the config would be ignored.</li>
2094  <li>Fixed a bug (Reactor #19) where 1) the 404_override route was being
2095  ignored in some cases, and 2) auto-loaded libraries were not
2096  available to the 404_override controller when a controller existed
2097  but the requested method did not.</li>
2098  <li>Fixed a bug (Reactor #89) where MySQL export would fail if the table
2099  had hyphens or other non alphanumeric/underscore characters.</li>
2100  <li>Fixed a bug (#105) that stopped query errors from being logged unless database debugging was enabled</li>
2101  <li>Fixed a bug (#160) - Removed unneeded array copy in the file cache
2102  driver.</li>
2103  <li>Fixed a bug (#150) - field_data() now correctly returns column
2104  length.</li>
2105  <li>Fixed a bug (#8) - load_class() now looks for core classes in
2106  APPPATH first, allowing them to be replaced.</li>
2107  <li>Fixed a bug (#24) - ODBC database driver called incorrect parent in __construct().</li>
2108  <li>Fixed a bug (#85) - OCI8 (Oracle) database escape_str() function did not escape correct.</li>
2109  <li>Fixed a bug (#344) - Using schema found in <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/sessions.html"><span class="doc">Saving Session Data to a Database</span></a>, system would throw error “user_data does not have a default value” when deleting then creating a session.</li>
2110  <li>Fixed a bug (#112) - OCI8 (Oracle) driver didn’t pass the configured database character set when connecting.</li>
2111  <li>Fixed a bug (#182) - OCI8 (Oracle) driver used to re-execute the statement whenever num_rows() is called.</li>
2112  <li>Fixed a bug (#82) - WHERE clause field names in the DB update_string() method were not escaped, resulting in failed queries in some cases.</li>
2113  <li>Fixed a bug (#89) - Fix a variable type mismatch in DB display_error() where an array is expected, but a string could be set instead.</li>
2114  <li>Fixed a bug (#467) - Suppress warnings generated from get_magic_quotes_gpc() (deprecated in PHP 5.4)</li>
2115  <li>Fixed a bug (#484) - First time _csrf_set_hash() is called, hash is never set to the cookie (in Security.php).</li>
2116  <li>Fixed a bug (#60) - Added _file_mime_type() method to the <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/file_uploading.html"><span class="doc">File Uploading Library</span></a> in order to fix a possible MIME-type injection.</li>
2117  <li>Fixed a bug (#537) - Support for all wav type in browser.</li>
2118  <li>Fixed a bug (#576) - Using ini_get() function to detect if apc is enabled or not.</li>
2119  <li>Fixed invalid date time format in <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/date_helper.html"><span class="doc">Date helper</span></a> and <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/xmlrpc.html"><span class="doc">XMLRPC library</span></a>.</li>
2120  <li>Fixed a bug (#200) - MySQL queries would be malformed after calling db-&gt;count_all() then db-&gt;get().</li>
2121  </ul>
2122  </div>
2123  </div>
2124  <div class="section" id="version-2-0-3">
2125  <h2>Version 2.0.3<a class="headerlink" href="#version-2-0-3" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
2126  <p>Release Date: August 20, 2011</p>
2127  <ul>
2128  <li><p class="first">Security</p>
2129  <ul>
2130  <li><p class="first">An improvement was made to the MySQL and MySQLi drivers to prevent
2131  exposing a potential vector for SQL injection on sites using
2132  multi-byte character sets in the database client connection.
2133  An incompatibility in PHP versions &lt; 5.2.3 and MySQL &lt; 5.0.7 with
2134  <em>mysql_set_charset()</em> creates a situation where using multi-byte
2135  character sets on these environments may potentially expose a SQL
2136  injection attack vector. Latin-1, UTF-8, and other “low ASCII”
2137  character sets are unaffected on all environments.</p>
2138  <p>If you are running or considering running a multi-byte character
2139  set for your database connection, please pay close attention to
2140  the server environment you are deploying on to ensure you are not
2141  vulnerable.</p>
2142  </li>
2143  </ul>
2144  </li>
2145  <li><p class="first">General Changes</p>
2146  <ul class="simple">
2147  <li>Fixed a bug where there was a misspelling within a code comment in
2148  the index.php file.</li>
2149  <li>Added Session Class userdata to the output profiler. Additionally,
2150  added a show/hide toggle on HTTP Headers, Session Data and Config
2151  Variables.</li>
2152  <li>Removed internal usage of the EXT constant.</li>
2153  <li>Visual updates to the welcome_message view file and default error
2154  templates. Thanks to <a class="reference external" href="https://bitbucket.org/danijelb">danijelb</a>
2155  for the pull request.</li>
2156  <li>Added insert_batch() function to the PostgreSQL database driver.
2157  Thanks to epallerols for the patch.</li>
2158  <li>Added “application/x-csv” to mimes.php.</li>
2159  <li>Fixed a bug where <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/email.html"><span class="doc">Email library</span></a>
2160  attachments with a “.” in the name would using invalid MIME-types.</li>
2161  </ul>
2162  </li>
2163  <li><p class="first">Helpers</p>
2164  <ul class="simple">
2165  <li>Added an optional third parameter to heading() which allows adding
2166  html attributes to the rendered heading tag.</li>
2167  <li>form_open() now only adds a hidden (Cross-site Reference Forgery)
2168  protection field when the form’s action is internal and is set to
2169  the post method. (Reactor #165)</li>
2170  <li>Re-worked plural() and singular() functions in the <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/inflector_helper.html"><span class="doc">Inflector
2171  helper</span></a> to support considerably
2172  more words.</li>
2173  </ul>
2174  </li>
2175  <li><p class="first">Libraries</p>
2176  <ul class="simple">
2177  <li>Altered Session to use a longer match against the user_agent
2178  string. See upgrade notes if using database sessions.</li>
2179  <li>Added $this-&gt;db-&gt;set_dbprefix() to the <a class="reference internal" href="database/queries.html"><span class="doc">Database
2180  Driver</span></a>.</li>
2181  <li>Changed $this-&gt;cart-&gt;insert() in the <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/cart.html"><span class="doc">Cart
2182  Library</span></a> to return the Row ID if a single
2183  item was inserted successfully.</li>
2184  <li>Added $this-&gt;load-&gt;get_var() to the <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/loader.html"><span class="doc">Loader
2185  library</span></a> to retrieve global vars set with
2186  $this-&gt;load-&gt;view() and $this-&gt;load-&gt;vars().</li>
2187  <li>Changed $this-&gt;db-&gt;having() to insert quotes using escape() rather
2188  than escape_str().</li>
2189  </ul>
2190  </li>
2191  </ul>
2192  <div class="section" id="bug-fixes-for-2-0-3">
2193  <h3>Bug fixes for 2.0.3<a class="headerlink" href="#bug-fixes-for-2-0-3" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h3>
2194  <ul class="simple">
2195  <li>Added ENVIRONMENT to reserved constants. (Reactor #196)</li>
2196  <li>Changed server check to ensure SCRIPT_NAME is defined. (Reactor #57)</li>
2197  <li>Removed APPPATH.’third_party’ from the packages autoloader to negate
2198  needless file stats if no packages exist or if the developer does not
2199  load any other packages by default.</li>
2200  <li>Fixed a bug (Reactor #231) where Sessions Library database table
2201  example SQL did not contain an index on last_activity. See <a class="reference internal" href="installation/upgrade_203.html"><span class="doc">Upgrade
2202  Notes</span></a>.</li>
2203  <li>Fixed a bug (Reactor #229) where the Sessions Library example SQL in
2204  the documentation contained incorrect SQL.</li>
2205  <li>Fixed a bug (Core #340) where when passing in the second parameter to
2206  $this-&gt;db-&gt;select(), column names in subsequent queries would not be
2207  properly escaped.</li>
2208  <li>Fixed issue #199 - Attributes passed as string does not include a
2209  space between it and the opening tag.</li>
2210  <li>Fixed a bug where the method $this-&gt;cart-&gt;total_items() from <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/cart.html"><span class="doc">Cart
2211  Library</span></a> now returns the sum of the quantity
2212  of all items in the cart instead of your total count.</li>
2213  <li>Fixed a bug where not setting ‘null’ when adding fields in db_forge
2214  for mysql and mysqli drivers would default to NULL instead of NOT
2215  NULL as the docs suggest.</li>
2216  <li>Fixed a bug where using $this-&gt;db-&gt;select_max(),
2217  $this-&gt;db-&gt;select_min(), etc could throw notices. Thanks to w43l for
2218  the patch.</li>
2219  <li>Replace checks for STDIN with php_sapi_name() == ‘cli’ which on the
2220  whole is more reliable. This should get parameters in crontab
2221  working.</li>
2222  </ul>
2223  </div>
2224  </div>
2225  <div class="section" id="version-2-0-2">
2226  <h2>Version 2.0.2<a class="headerlink" href="#version-2-0-2" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
2227  <p>Release Date: April 7, 2011
2228  Hg Tag: v2.0.2</p>
2229  <ul class="simple">
2230  <li>General changes<ul>
2231  <li>The <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/security.html"><span class="doc">Security library</span></a> was moved to
2232  the core and is now loaded automatically. Please remove your
2233  loading calls.</li>
2234  <li>The CI_SHA class is now deprecated. All supported versions of PHP
2235  provide a sha1() function.</li>
2236  <li>constants.php will now be loaded from the environment folder if
2237  available.</li>
2238  <li>Added language key error logging</li>
2239  <li>Made Environment Support optional. Comment out or delete the
2240  constant to stop environment checks.</li>
2241  <li>Added Environment Support for Hooks.</li>
2242  <li>Added CI_ Prefix to the <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/caching.html"><span class="doc">Cache driver</span></a>.</li>
2243  <li>Added <a class="reference internal" href="general/cli.html"><span class="doc">CLI usage</span></a> documentation.</li>
2244  </ul>
2245  </li>
2246  <li>Helpers<ul>
2247  <li>Removed the previously deprecated dohash() from the <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/security_helper.html"><span class="doc">Security
2248  helper</span></a>; use do_hash() instead.</li>
2249  <li>Changed the ‘plural’ function so that it doesn’t ruin the
2250  captalization of your string. It also take into consideration
2251  acronyms which are all caps.</li>
2252  </ul>
2253  </li>
2254  <li>Database<ul>
2255  <li>$this-&gt;db-&gt;count_all_results() will now return an integer
2256  instead of a string.</li>
2257  </ul>
2258  </li>
2259  </ul>
2260  <div class="section" id="bug-fixes-for-2-0-2">
2261  <h3>Bug fixes for 2.0.2<a class="headerlink" href="#bug-fixes-for-2-0-2" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h3>
2262  <ul class="simple">
2263  <li>Fixed a bug (Reactor #145) where the Output Library had
2264  parse_exec_vars set to protected.</li>
2265  <li>Fixed a bug (Reactor #80) where is_really_writable would create an
2266  empty file when on Windows or with safe_mode enabled.</li>
2267  <li>Fixed various bugs with User Guide.</li>
2268  <li>Added is_cli_request() method to documentation for <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/input.html"><span class="doc">Input
2269  class</span></a>.</li>
2270  <li>Added form_validation_lang entries for decimal, less_than and
2271  greater_than.</li>
2272  <li>Fixed issue #153 Escape Str Bug in MSSQL driver.</li>
2273  <li>Fixed issue #172 Google Chrome 11 posts incorrectly when action is empty.</li>
2274  </ul>
2275  </div>
2276  </div>
2277  <div class="section" id="version-2-0-1">
2278  <h2>Version 2.0.1<a class="headerlink" href="#version-2-0-1" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
2279  <p>Release Date: March 15, 2011
2280  Hg Tag: v2.0.1</p>
2281  <ul class="simple">
2282  <li>General changes<ul>
2283  <li>Added $config[‘cookie_secure’] to the config file to allow
2284  requiring a secure (HTTPS) in order to set cookies.</li>
2285  <li>Added the constant CI_CORE to help differentiate between Core:
2286  TRUE and Reactor: FALSE.</li>
2287  <li>Added an ENVIRONMENT constant in index.php, which affects PHP
2288  error reporting settings, and optionally, which configuration
2289  files are loaded (see below). Read more on the <a class="reference internal" href="general/environments.html"><span class="doc">Handling
2290  Environments</span></a> page.</li>
2291  <li>Added support for
2292  <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/config.html#config-environments"><span class="std std-ref">environment-specific</span></a>
2293  configuration files.</li>
2294  </ul>
2295  </li>
2296  <li>Libraries<ul>
2297  <li>Added decimal, less_than and greater_than rules to the <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/form_validation.html"><span class="doc">Form
2298  validation Class</span></a>.</li>
2299  <li><a class="reference internal" href="libraries/input.html"><span class="doc">Input Class</span></a> methods post() and get()
2300  will now return a full array if the first argument is not
2301  provided.</li>
2302  <li>Secure cookies can now be made with the set_cookie() helper and
2303  <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/input.html"><span class="doc">Input Class</span></a> method.</li>
2304  <li>Added set_content_type() to <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/output.html"><span class="doc">Output
2305  Class</span></a> to set the output Content-Type
2306  HTTP header based on a MIME Type or a config/mimes.php array key.</li>
2307  <li><a class="reference internal" href="libraries/output.html"><span class="doc">Output Class</span></a> will now support method
2308  chaining.</li>
2309  </ul>
2310  </li>
2311  <li>Helpers<ul>
2312  <li>Changed the logic for form_open() in <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/form_helper.html"><span class="doc">Form
2313  helper</span></a>. If no value is passed it will
2314  submit to the current URL.</li>
2315  </ul>
2316  </li>
2317  </ul>
2318  <div class="section" id="bug-fixes-for-2-0-1">
2319  <h3>Bug fixes for 2.0.1<a class="headerlink" href="#bug-fixes-for-2-0-1" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h3>
2320  <ul class="simple">
2321  <li>CLI requests can now be run from any folder, not just when CD’ed next
2322  to index.php.</li>
2323  <li>Fixed issue #41: Added audio/mp3 mime type to mp3.</li>
2324  <li>Fixed a bug (Core #329) where the file caching driver referenced the
2325  incorrect cache directory.</li>
2326  <li>Fixed a bug (Reactor #69) where the SHA1 library was named
2327  incorrectly.</li>
2328  </ul>
2329  </div>
2330  </div>
2331  <div class="section" id="version-2-0-0">
2332  <span id="changelog"></span><h2>Version 2.0.0<a class="headerlink" href="#version-2-0-0" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
2333  <p>Release Date: January 28, 2011
2334  Hg Tag: v2.0.0</p>
2335  <ul class="simple">
2336  <li>General changes<ul>
2337  <li>PHP 4 support is removed. CodeIgniter now requires PHP 5.1.6.</li>
2338  <li>Scaffolding, having been deprecated for a number of versions, has
2339  been removed.</li>
2340  <li>Plugins have been removed, in favor of Helpers. The CAPTCHA plugin
2341  has been converted to a Helper and
2342  <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/captcha_helper.html"><span class="doc">documented</span></a>. The JavaScript
2343  calendar plugin was removed due to the ready availability of great
2344  JavaScript calendars, particularly with jQuery.</li>
2345  <li>Added new special Library type:
2346  <a class="reference internal" href="general/drivers.html"><span class="doc">Drivers</span></a>.</li>
2347  <li>Added full query-string support. See the config file for details.</li>
2348  <li>Moved the application folder outside of the system folder.</li>
2349  <li>Moved system/cache and system/logs directories to the application
2350  directory.</li>
2351  <li>Added routing overrides to the main index.php file, enabling the
2352  normal routing to be overridden on a per “index” file basis.</li>
2353  <li>Added the ability to set config values (or override config values)
2354  directly from data set in the main index.php file. This allows a
2355  single application to be used with multiple front controllers,
2356  each having its own config values.</li>
2357  <li>Added $config[‘directory_trigger’] to the config file so that a
2358  controller sub-directory can be specified when running _GET
2359  strings instead of URI segments.</li>
2360  <li>Added ability to set “Package” paths - specific paths where the
2361  Loader and Config classes should try to look first for a requested
2362  file. This allows distribution of sub-applications with their own
2363  libraries, models, config files, etc. in a single “package”
2364  directory. See the <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/loader.html"><span class="doc">Loader class</span></a>
2365  documentation for more details.</li>
2366  <li>In-development code is now hosted at BitBucket .</li>
2367  <li>Removed the deprecated Validation Class.</li>
2368  <li>Added CI_ Prefix to all core classes.</li>
2369  <li>Package paths can now be set in application/config/autoload.php.</li>
2370  <li><a class="reference internal" href="libraries/file_uploading.html"><span class="doc">Upload library</span></a> file_name can
2371  now be set without an extension, the extension will be taken from
2372  the uploaded file instead of the given name.</li>
2373  <li>In <a class="reference internal" href="database/forge.html"><span class="doc">Database Forge</span></a> the name can be omitted
2374  from $this-&gt;dbforge-&gt;modify_column()’s 2nd param if you aren’t
2375  changing the name.</li>
2376  <li>$config[‘base_url’] is now empty by default and will guess what
2377  it should be.</li>
2378  <li>Enabled full Command Line Interface compatibility with
2379  config[‘uri_protocol’] = ‘CLI’;.</li>
2380  </ul>
2381  </li>
2382  <li>Libraries<ul>
2383  <li>Added a <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/caching.html"><span class="doc">Cache driver</span></a> with APC,
2384  memcached, and file-based support.</li>
2385  <li>Added $prefix, $suffix and $first_url properties to <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/pagination.html"><span class="doc">Pagination
2386  library</span></a>.</li>
2387  <li>Added the ability to suppress first, previous, next, last, and
2388  page links by setting their values to FALSE in the <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/pagination.html"><span class="doc">Pagination
2389  library</span></a>.</li>
2390  <li>Added <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/security.html"><span class="doc">Security library</span></a>, which now
2391  contains the xss_clean function, filename_security function and
2392  other security related functions.</li>
2393  <li>Added CSRF (Cross-site Reference Forgery) protection to the
2394  <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/security.html"><span class="doc">Security library</span></a>.</li>
2395  <li>Added $parse_exec_vars property to Output library.</li>
2396  <li>Added ability to enable / disable individual sections of the
2397  <a class="reference internal" href="general/profiling.html"><span class="doc">Profiler</span></a></li>
2398  <li>Added a wildcard option $config[‘allowed_types’] = ‘*’ to the
2399  <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/file_uploading.html"><span class="doc">File Uploading Class</span></a>.</li>
2400  <li>Added an ‘object’ config variable to the XML-RPC Server library so
2401  that one can specify the object to look for requested methods,
2402  instead of assuming it is in the $CI superobject.</li>
2403  <li>Added “is_object” into the list of unit tests capable of being
2404  run.</li>
2405  <li>Table library will generate an empty cell with a blank string, or
2406  NULL value.</li>
2407  <li>Added ability to set tag attributes for individual cells in the
2408  Table library</li>
2409  <li>Added a parse_string() method to the <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/parser.html"><span class="doc">Parser
2410  Class</span></a>.</li>
2411  <li>Added HTTP headers and Config information to the
2412  <a class="reference internal" href="general/profiling.html"><span class="doc">Profiler</span></a> output.</li>
2413  <li>Added Chrome and Flock to the list of detectable browsers by
2414  browser() in the <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/user_agent.html"><span class="doc">User Agent Class</span></a>.</li>
2415  <li>The <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/unit_testing.html"><span class="doc">Unit Test Class</span></a> now has an
2416  optional “notes” field available to it, and allows for discrete
2417  display of test result items using
2418  $this-&gt;unit-&gt;set_test_items().</li>
2419  <li>Added a $xss_clean class variable to the XMLRPC library, enabling
2420  control over the use of the Security library’s xss_clean()
2421  method.</li>
2422  <li>Added a download() method to the <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/ftp.html"><span class="doc">FTP
2423  library</span></a></li>
2424  <li>Changed do_xss_clean() to return FALSE if the uploaded file
2425  fails XSS checks.</li>
2426  <li>Added stripslashes() and trim()ing of double quotes from $_FILES
2427  type value to standardize input in Upload library.</li>
2428  <li>Added a second parameter (boolean) to
2429  $this-&gt;zip-&gt;read_dir(‘/path/to/directory’, FALSE) to remove the
2430  preceding trail of empty folders when creating a Zip archive. This
2431  example would contain a zip with “directory” and all of its
2432  contents.</li>
2433  <li>Added ability in the Image Library to handle PNG transparency for
2434  resize operations when using the GD lib.</li>
2435  <li>Modified the Session class to prevent use if no encryption key is
2436  set in the config file.</li>
2437  <li>Added a new config item to the Session class
2438  sess_expire_on_close to allow sessions to auto-expire when the
2439  browser window is closed.</li>
2440  <li>Improved performance of the Encryption library on servers where
2441  Mcrypt is available.</li>
2442  <li>Changed the default encryption mode in the Encryption library to
2443  CBC.</li>
2444  <li>Added an encode_from_legacy() method to provide a way to
2445  transition encrypted data from CodeIgniter 1.x to CodeIgniter 2.x.
2446  Please see the <a class="reference internal" href="installation/upgrade_200.html"><span class="doc">upgrade
2447  instructions</span></a> for details.</li>
2448  <li>Altered Form_Validation library to allow for method chaining on
2449  set_rules(), set_message() and set_error_delimiters()
2450  functions.</li>
2451  <li>Altered Email Library to allow for method chaining.</li>
2452  <li>Added request_headers(), get_request_header() and
2453  is_ajax_request() to the input class.</li>
2454  <li>Altered <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/user_agent.html"><span class="doc">User agent library</span></a> so that
2455  is_browser(), is_mobile() and is_robot() can optionally check
2456  for a specific browser or mobile device.</li>
2457  <li>Altered <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/input.html"><span class="doc">Input library</span></a> so that post() and
2458  get() will return all POST and GET items (respectively) if there
2459  are no parameters passed in.</li>
2460  </ul>
2461  </li>
2462  <li>Database<ul>
2463  <li><a class="reference internal" href="database/configuration.html"><span class="doc">database configuration</span></a>.</li>
2464  <li>Added autoinit value to <a class="reference internal" href="database/configuration.html"><span class="doc">database
2465  configuration</span></a>.</li>
2466  <li>Added stricton value to <a class="reference internal" href="database/configuration.html"><span class="doc">database
2467  configuration</span></a>.</li>
2468  <li>Added database_exists() to the <a class="reference internal" href="database/utilities.html"><span class="doc">Database Utilities
2469  Class</span></a>.</li>
2470  <li>Semantic change to db-&gt;version() function to allow a list of
2471  exceptions for databases with functions to return version string
2472  instead of specially formed SQL queries. Currently this list only
2473  includes Oracle and SQLite.</li>
2474  <li>Fixed a bug where driver specific table identifier protection
2475  could lead to malformed queries in the field_data() functions.</li>
2476  <li>Fixed a bug where an undefined class variable was referenced in
2477  database drivers.</li>
2478  <li>Modified the database errors to show the filename and line number
2479  of the problematic query.</li>
2480  <li>Removed the following deprecated functions: orwhere, orlike,
2481  groupby, orhaving, orderby, getwhere.</li>
2482  <li>Removed deprecated _drop_database() and _create_database()
2483  functions from the db utility drivers.</li>
2484  <li>Improved dbforge create_table() function for the Postgres driver.</li>
2485  </ul>
2486  </li>
2487  <li>Helpers<ul>
2488  <li>Added convert_accented_characters() function to <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/text_helper.html"><span class="doc">text
2489  helper</span></a>.</li>
2490  <li>Added accept-charset to the list of inserted attributes of
2491  form_open() in the <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/form_helper.html"><span class="doc">Form Helper</span></a>.</li>
2492  <li>Deprecated the dohash() function in favour of do_hash() for
2493  naming consistency.</li>
2494  <li>Non-backwards compatible change made to get_dir_file_info() in
2495  the <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/file_helper.html"><span class="doc">File Helper</span></a>. No longer recurses
2496  by default so as to encourage responsible use (this function can
2497  cause server performance issues when used without caution).</li>
2498  <li>Modified the second parameter of directory_map() in the
2499  <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/directory_helper.html"><span class="doc">Directory Helper</span></a> to accept an
2500  integer to specify recursion depth.</li>
2501  <li>Modified delete_files() in the <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/file_helper.html"><span class="doc">File
2502  Helper</span></a> to return FALSE on failure.</li>
2503  <li>Added an optional second parameter to byte_format() in the
2504  <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/number_helper.html"><span class="doc">Number Helper</span></a> to allow for decimal
2505  precision.</li>
2506  <li>Added alpha, and sha1 string types to random_string() in the
2507  <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/string_helper.html"><span class="doc">String Helper</span></a>.</li>
2508  <li>Modified prep_url() so as to not prepend http:// if the supplied
2509  string already has a scheme.</li>
2510  <li>Modified get_file_info in the file helper, changing filectime()
2511  to filemtime() for dates.</li>
2512  <li>Modified smiley_js() to add optional third parameter to return
2513  only the javascript with no script tags.</li>
2514  <li>The img() function of the <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/html_helper.html"><span class="doc">HTML
2515  helper</span></a> will now generate an empty
2516  string as an alt attribute if one is not provided.</li>
2517  <li>If CSRF is enabled in the application config file, form_open()
2518  will automatically insert it as a hidden field.</li>
2519  <li>Added sanitize_filename() into the <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/security_helper.html"><span class="doc">Security
2520  helper</span></a>.</li>
2521  <li>Added ellipsize() to the <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/text_helper.html"><span class="doc">Text
2522  Helper</span></a></li>
2523  <li>Added elements() to the <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/array_helper.html"><span class="doc">Array
2524  Helper</span></a></li>
2525  </ul>
2526  </li>
2527  <li>Other Changes<ul>
2528  <li>Added an optional second parameter to show_404() to disable
2529  logging.</li>
2530  <li>Updated loader to automatically apply the sub-class prefix as an
2531  option when loading classes. Class names can be prefixed with the
2532  standard “CI_” or the same prefix as the subclass prefix, or no
2533  prefix at all.</li>
2534  <li>Increased randomness with is_really_writable() to avoid file
2535  collisions when hundreds or thousands of requests occur at once.</li>
2536  <li>Switched some DIR_WRITE_MODE constant uses to FILE_WRITE_MODE
2537  where files and not directories are being operated on.</li>
2538  <li>get_mime_by_extension() is now case insensitive.</li>
2539  <li>Added “default” to the list <a class="reference internal" href="general/reserved_names.html"><span class="doc">Reserved
2540  Names</span></a>.</li>
2541  <li>Added ‘application/x-msdownload’ for .exe files and
2542  ‘application/x-gzip-compressed’ for .tgz files to
2543  config/mimes.php.</li>
2544  <li>Updated the output library to no longer compress output or send
2545  content-length headers if the server runs with
2546  zlib.output_compression enabled.</li>
2547  <li>Eliminated a call to is_really_writable() on each request unless
2548  it is really needed (Output caching)</li>
2549  <li>Documented append_output() in the <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/output.html"><span class="doc">Output
2550  Class</span></a>.</li>
2551  <li>Documented a second argument in the decode() function for the
2552  <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/encrypt.html"><span class="doc">Encrypt Class</span></a>.</li>
2553  <li>Documented db-&gt;close().</li>
2554  <li>Updated the router to support a default route with any number of
2555  segments.</li>
2556  <li>Moved _remove_invisible_characters() function from the
2557  <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/security.html"><span class="doc">Security Library</span></a> to <a class="reference internal" href="general/common_functions.html"><span class="doc">common
2558  functions.</span></a></li>
2559  <li>Added audio/mpeg3 as a valid mime type for MP3.</li>
2560  </ul>
2561  </li>
2562  </ul>
2563  <div class="section" id="bug-fixes-for-2-0-0">
2564  <h3>Bug fixes for 2.0.0<a class="headerlink" href="#bug-fixes-for-2-0-0" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h3>
2565  <ul class="simple">
2566  <li>Fixed a bug where you could not change the User-Agent when sending
2567  email.</li>
2568  <li>Fixed a bug where the Output class would send incorrect cached output
2569  for controllers implementing their own _output() method.</li>
2570  <li>Fixed a bug where a failed query would not have a saved query
2571  execution time causing errors in the Profiler</li>
2572  <li>Fixed a bug that was writing log entries when multiple identical
2573  helpers and plugins were loaded.</li>
2574  <li>Fixed assorted user guide typos or examples (#10693, #8951, #7825,
2575  #8660, #7883, #6771, #10656).</li>
2576  <li>Fixed a language key in the profiler: “profiler_no_memory_usage”
2577  to “profiler_no_memory”.</li>
2578  <li>Fixed an error in the Zip library that didn’t allow downloading on
2579  PHP 4 servers.</li>
2580  <li>Fixed a bug in the Form Validation library where fields passed as
2581  rule parameters were not being translated (#9132)</li>
2582  <li>Modified inflector helper to properly pluralize words that end in
2583  ‘ch’ or ‘sh’</li>
2584  <li>Fixed a bug in xss_clean() that was not allowing hyphens in query
2585  strings of submitted URLs.</li>
2586  <li>Fixed bugs in get_dir_file_info() and get_file_info() in the
2587  File Helper with recursion, and file paths on Windows.</li>
2588  <li>Fixed a bug where Active Record override parameter would not let you
2589  disable Active Record if it was enabled in your database config file.</li>
2590  <li>Fixed a bug in reduce_double_slashes() in the String Helper to
2591  properly remove duplicate leading slashes (#7585)</li>
2592  <li>Fixed a bug in values_parsing() of the XML-RPC library which
2593  prevented NULL variables typed as ‘string’ from being handled
2594  properly.</li>
2595  <li>Fixed a bug were form_open_multipart() didn’t accept string
2596  attribute arguments (#10930).</li>
2597  <li>Fixed a bug (#10470) where get_mime_by_extension() was case
2598  sensitive.</li>
2599  <li>Fixed a bug where some error messages for the SQLite and Oracle
2600  drivers would not display.</li>
2601  <li>Fixed a bug where files created with the Zip Library would result in
2602  file creation dates of 1980.</li>
2603  <li>Fixed a bug in the Session library that would result in PHP error
2604  when attempting to store values with objects.</li>
2605  <li>Fixed a bug where extending the Controller class would result in a
2606  fatal PHP error.</li>
2607  <li>Fixed a PHP Strict Standards Error in the index.php file.</li>
2608  <li>Fixed a bug where getimagesize() was being needlessly checked on
2609  non-image files in is_allowed_type().</li>
2610  <li>Fixed a bug in the Encryption library where an empty key was not
2611  triggering an error.</li>
2612  <li>Fixed a bug in the Email library where CC and BCC recipients were not
2613  reset when using the clear() method (#109).</li>
2614  <li>Fixed a bug in the URL Helper where prep_url() could cause a PHP
2615  error on PHP versions &lt; 5.1.2.</li>
2616  <li>Added a log message in core/output if the cache directory config
2617  value was not found.</li>
2618  <li>Fixed a bug where multiple libraries could not be loaded by passing
2619  an array to load-&gt;library()</li>
2620  <li>Fixed a bug in the html helper where too much white space was
2621  rendered between the src and alt tags in the img() function.</li>
2622  <li>Fixed a bug in the profilers _compile_queries() function.</li>
2623  <li>Fixed a bug in the date helper where the DATE_ISO8601 variable was
2624  returning an incorrectly formatted date string.</li>
2625  </ul>
2626  </div>
2627  </div>
2628  <div class="section" id="version-1-7-2">
2629  <h2>Version 1.7.2<a class="headerlink" href="#version-1-7-2" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
2630  <p>Release Date: September 11, 2009
2631  Hg Tag: v1.7.2</p>
2632  <ul class="simple">
2633  <li>Libraries<ul>
2634  <li>Added a new <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/cart.html"><span class="doc">Cart Class</span></a>.</li>
2635  <li>Added the ability to pass $config[‘file_name’] for the <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/file_uploading.html"><span class="doc">File
2636  Uploading Class</span></a> and rename the
2637  uploaded file.</li>
2638  <li>Changed order of listed user-agents so Safari would more
2639  accurately report itself. (#6844)</li>
2640  </ul>
2641  </li>
2642  <li>Database<ul>
2643  <li>Switched from using gettype() in escape() to is_* methods, since
2644  future PHP versions might change its output.</li>
2645  <li>Updated all database drivers to handle arrays in escape_str()</li>
2646  <li>Added escape_like_str() method for escaping strings to be used
2647  in LIKE conditions</li>
2648  <li>Updated Active Record to utilize the new LIKE escaping mechanism.</li>
2649  <li>Added reconnect() method to DB drivers to try to keep alive /
2650  reestablish a connection after a long idle.</li>
2651  <li>Modified MSSQL driver to use mssql_get_last_message() for error
2652  messages.</li>
2653  </ul>
2654  </li>
2655  <li>Helpers<ul>
2656  <li>Added form_multiselect() to the <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/form_helper.html"><span class="doc">Form
2657  helper</span></a>.</li>
2658  <li>Modified form_hidden() in the <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/form_helper.html"><span class="doc">Form
2659  helper</span></a> to accept multi-dimensional
2660  arrays.</li>
2661  <li>Modified form_prep() in the <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/form_helper.html"><span class="doc">Form
2662  helper</span></a> to keep track of prepped
2663  fields to avoid multiple prep/mutation from subsequent calls which
2664  can occur when using Form Validation and form helper functions to
2665  output form fields.</li>
2666  <li>Modified directory_map() in the <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/directory_helper.html"><span class="doc">Directory
2667  helper</span></a> to allow the inclusion of
2668  hidden files, and to return FALSE on failure to read directory.</li>
2669  <li>Modified the <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/smiley_helper.html"><span class="doc">Smiley helper</span></a> to work
2670  with multiple fields and insert the smiley at the last known
2671  cursor position.</li>
2672  </ul>
2673  </li>
2674  <li>General<ul>
2675  <li>Compatible with PHP 5.3.0.</li>
2676  <li>Modified <a class="reference internal" href="general/errors.html"><span class="doc">show_error()</span></a> to allow sending
2677  of HTTP server response codes.</li>
2678  <li>Modified <a class="reference internal" href="general/errors.html"><span class="doc">show_404()</span></a> to send 404 status
2679  code, removing non-CGI compatible header() statement from
2680  error_404.php template.</li>
2681  <li>Added set_status_header() to the <a class="reference internal" href="general/common_functions.html"><span class="doc">Common
2682  functions</span></a> to allow use when the
2683  Output class is unavailable.</li>
2684  <li>Added is_php() to <a class="reference internal" href="general/common_functions.html"><span class="doc">Common
2685  functions</span></a> to facilitate PHP
2686  version comparisons.</li>
2687  <li>Added 2 CodeIgniter “cheatsheets” (thanks to DesignFellow.com for
2688  this contribution).</li>
2689  </ul>
2690  </li>
2691  </ul>
2692  <div class="section" id="bug-fixes-for-1-7-2">
2693  <h3>Bug fixes for 1.7.2<a class="headerlink" href="#bug-fixes-for-1-7-2" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h3>
2694  <ul class="simple">
2695  <li>Fixed assorted user guide typos or examples (#6743, #7214, #7516,
2696  #7287, #7852, #8224, #8324, #8349).</li>
2697  <li>Fixed a bug in the Form Validation library where multiple callbacks
2698  weren’t working (#6110)</li>
2699  <li>doctype helper default value was missing a “1”.</li>
2700  <li>Fixed a bug in the language class when outputting an error for an
2701  unfound file.</li>
2702  <li>Fixed a bug in the Calendar library where the shortname was output
2703  for “May”.</li>
2704  <li>Fixed a bug with ORIG_PATH_INFO that was allowing URIs of just a
2705  slash through.</li>
2706  <li>Fixed a fatal error in the Oracle and ODBC drivers (#6752)</li>
2707  <li>Fixed a bug where xml_from_result() was checking for a nonexistent
2708  method.</li>
2709  <li>Fixed a bug where Database Forge’s add_column and modify_column
2710  were not looping through when sent multiple fields.</li>
2711  <li>Fixed a bug where the File Helper was using ‘/’ instead of the
2712  DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR constant.</li>
2713  <li>Fixed a bug to prevent PHP errors when attempting to use sendmail on
2714  servers that have manually disabled the PHP popen() function.</li>
2715  <li>Fixed a bug that would cause PHP errors in XML-RPC data if the PHP
2716  data type did not match the specified XML-RPC type.</li>
2717  <li>Fixed a bug in the XML-RPC class with parsing dateTime.iso8601 data
2718  types.</li>
2719  <li>Fixed a case sensitive string replacement in xss_clean()</li>
2720  <li>Fixed a bug in form_textarea() where form data was not prepped
2721  correctly.</li>
2722  <li>Fixed a bug in form_prep() causing it to not preserve entities in
2723  the user’s original input when called back into a form element</li>
2724  <li>Fixed a bug in _protect_identifiers() where the swap prefix
2725  ($swap_pre) was not being observed.</li>
2726  <li>Fixed a bug where the 400 status header sent with the ‘disallowed URI
2727  characters’ was not compatible with CGI environments.</li>
2728  <li>Fixed a bug in the typography class where heading tags could have
2729  paragraph tags inserted when using auto_typography().</li>
2730  </ul>
2731  </div>
2732  </div>
2733  <div class="section" id="version-1-7-1">
2734  <h2>Version 1.7.1<a class="headerlink" href="#version-1-7-1" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
2735  <p>Release Date: February 10, 2009
2736  Hg Tag: 1.7.1</p>
2737  <ul class="simple">
2738  <li>Libraries<ul>
2739  <li>Fixed an arbitrary script execution security flaw (#6068) in the
2740  Form Validation library (thanks to hkk)</li>
2741  <li>Changed default current page indicator in the Pagination library
2742  to use &lt;strong&gt; instead of &lt;b&gt;</li>
2743  <li>A “HTTP/1.1 400 Bad Request” header is now sent when disallowed
2744  characters are encountered.</li>
2745  <li>Added &lt;big&gt;, &lt;small&gt;, &lt;q&gt;, and &lt;tt&gt; to the Typography parser’s
2746  inline elements.</li>
2747  <li>Added more accurate error reporting for the Email library when
2748  using sendmail.</li>
2749  <li>Removed a strict type check from the rotate() function of the
2750  <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/image_lib.html"><span class="doc">Image Manipulation Class</span></a>.</li>
2751  <li>Added enhanced error checking in file saving in the Image library
2752  when using the GD lib.</li>
2753  <li>Added an additional newline between multipart email headers and
2754  the MIME message text for better compatibility with a variety of
2755  MUAs.</li>
2756  <li>Made modest improvements to efficiency and accuracy of
2757  explode_name() in the Image lib.</li>
2758  </ul>
2759  </li>
2760  <li>Database<ul>
2761  <li>Added where_in to the list of expected arguments received by
2762  delete().</li>
2763  </ul>
2764  </li>
2765  <li>Helpers<ul>
2766  <li>Added the ability to have optgroups in form_dropdown() within the
2767  <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/form_helper.html"><span class="doc">form helper</span></a>.</li>
2768  <li>Added a doctype() function to the <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/html_helper.html"><span class="doc">HTML
2769  helper</span></a>.</li>
2770  <li>Added ability to force lowercase for url_title() in the <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/url_helper.html"><span class="doc">URL
2771  helper</span></a>.</li>
2772  <li>Changed the default “type” of form_button() to “button” from
2773  “submit” in the <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/form_helper.html"><span class="doc">form helper</span></a>.</li>
2774  <li>Changed redirect() in the URL helper to allow redirections to URLs
2775  outside of the CI site.</li>
2776  <li>Updated get_cookie() to try to fetch the cookie using the global
2777  cookie prefix if the requested cookie name doesn’t exist.</li>
2778  </ul>
2779  </li>
2780  <li>Other Changes<ul>
2781  <li>Improved security in xss_clean() to help prevent attacks
2782  targeting Internet Explorer.</li>
2783  <li>Added ‘application/msexcel’ to config/mimes.php for .xls files.</li>
2784  <li>Added ‘proxy_ips’ config item to whitelist reverse proxy servers
2785  from which to trust the HTTP_X_FORWARDED_FOR header to to
2786  determine the visitor’s IP address.</li>
2787  <li>Improved accuracy of Upload::is_allowed_filetype() for images
2788  (#6715)</li>
2789  </ul>
2790  </li>
2791  </ul>
2792  <div class="section" id="bug-fixes-for-1-7-1">
2793  <h3>Bug fixes for 1.7.1<a class="headerlink" href="#bug-fixes-for-1-7-1" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h3>
2794  <ul class="simple">
2795  <li>Database<ul>
2796  <li>Fixed a bug when doing ‘random’ on order_by() (#5706).</li>
2797  <li>Fixed a bug where adding a primary key through Forge could fail
2798  (#5731).</li>
2799  <li>Fixed a bug when using DB cache on multiple databases (#5737).</li>
2800  <li>Fixed a bug where TRUNCATE was not considered a “write” query
2801  (#6619).</li>
2802  <li>Fixed a bug where csv_from_result() was checking for a
2803  nonexistent method.</li>
2804  <li>Fixed a bug _protect_identifiers() where it was improperly
2805  removing all pipe symbols from items</li>
2806  </ul>
2807  </li>
2808  <li>Fixed assorted user guide typos or examples (#5998, #6093, #6259,
2809  #6339, #6432, #6521).</li>
2810  <li>Fixed a bug in the MySQLi driver when no port is specified</li>
2811  <li>Fixed a bug (#5702), in which the field label was not being fetched
2812  properly, when “matching” one field to another.</li>
2813  <li>Fixed a bug in which identifers were not being escaped properly when
2814  reserved characters were used.</li>
2815  <li>Fixed a bug with the regular expression used to protect submitted
2816  paragraph tags in auto typography.</li>
2817  <li>Fixed a bug where double dashes within tag attributes were being
2818  converted to em dash entities.</li>
2819  <li>Fixed a bug where double spaces within tag attributes were being
2820  converted to non-breaking space entities.</li>
2821  <li>Fixed some accuracy issues with curly quotes in
2822  Typography::format_characters()</li>
2823  <li>Changed a few docblock comments to reflect actual return values.</li>
2824  <li>Fixed a bug with high ascii characters in subject and from email
2825  headers.</li>
2826  <li>Fixed a bug in xss_clean() where whitespace following a validated
2827  character entity would not be preserved.</li>
2828  <li>Fixed a bug where HTML comments and &lt;pre&gt; tags were being parsed in
2829  Typography::auto_typography().</li>
2830  <li>Fixed a bug with non-breaking space cleanup in
2831  Typography::auto_typography().</li>
2832  <li>Fixed a bug in database escaping where a compound statement (ie:
2833  SUM()) wasn’t handled correctly with database prefixes.</li>
2834  <li>Fixed a bug when an opening quote is preceded by a paragraph tag and
2835  immediately followed by another tag.</li>
2836  <li>Fixed a bug in the Text Helper affecting some locales where
2837  word_censor() would not work on words beginning or ending with an
2838  accented character.</li>
2839  <li>Fixed a bug in the Text Helper character limiter where the provided
2840  limit intersects the last word of the string.</li>
2841  <li>Fixed a bug (#6342) with plural() in the Inflection helper with words
2842  ending in “y”.</li>
2843  <li>Fixed bug (#6517) where Routed URI segments returned by
2844  URI::rsegment() method were incorrect for the default controller.</li>
2845  <li>Fixed a bug (#6706) in the Security Helper where xss_clean() was
2846  using a deprecated second argument.</li>
2847  <li>Fixed a bug in the URL helper url_title() function where trailing
2848  periods were allowed at the end of a URL.</li>
2849  <li>Fixed a bug (#6669) in the Email class when CRLF’s are used for the
2850  newline character with headers when used with the “mail” protocol.</li>
2851  <li>Fixed a bug (#6500) where URI::A_filter_uri() was exit()ing an
2852  error instead of using show_error().</li>
2853  <li>Fixed a bug (#6592) in the File Helper where get_dir_file_info()
2854  where recursion was not occurring properly.</li>
2855  <li>Tweaked Typography::auto_typography() for some edge-cases.</li>
2856  </ul>
2857  </div>
2858  </div>
2859  <div class="section" id="version-1-7">
2860  <h2>Version 1.7<a class="headerlink" href="#version-1-7" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
2861  <p>Release Date: October 23, 2008
2862  Hg Tag: 1.7.0</p>
2863  <ul class="simple">
2864  <li>Libraries<ul>
2865  <li>Added a new <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/form_validation.html"><span class="doc">Form Validation
2866  Class</span></a>. It simplifies setting
2867  rules and field names, supports arrays as field names, allows
2868  groups of validation rules to be saved in a config file, and adds
2869  some helper functions for use in view files. <strong>Please note that
2870  the old Validation class is now deprecated</strong>. We will leave it in
2871  the library folder for some time so that existing applications
2872  that use it will not break, but you are encouraged to migrate to
2873  the new version.</li>
2874  <li>Updated the <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/sessions.html"><span class="doc">Sessions class</span></a> so that
2875  any custom data being saved gets stored to a database rather than
2876  the session cookie (assuming you are using a database to store
2877  session data), permitting much more data to be saved.</li>
2878  <li>Added the ability to store libraries in subdirectories within
2879  either the main “libraries” or the local application “libraries”
2880  folder. Please see the <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/loader.html"><span class="doc">Loader class</span></a> for
2881  more info.</li>
2882  <li>Added the ability to assign library objects to your own variable
2883  names when you use $this-&gt;load-&gt;library(). Please see the <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/loader.html"><span class="doc">Loader
2884  class</span></a> for more info.</li>
2885  <li>Added controller class/method info to <a class="reference internal" href="general/profiling.html"><span class="doc">Profiler
2886  class</span></a> and support for multiple database
2887  connections.</li>
2888  <li>Improved the “auto typography” feature and moved it out of the
2889  helper into its own <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/typography.html"><span class="doc">Typography
2890  Class</span></a>.</li>
2891  <li>Improved performance and accuracy of xss_clean(), including
2892  reduction of false positives on image/file tests.</li>
2893  <li>Improved <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/parser.html"><span class="doc">Parser class</span></a> to allow
2894  multiple calls to the parse() function. The output of each is
2895  appended in the output.</li>
2896  <li>Added max_filename option to set a file name length limit in the
2897  <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/file_uploading.html"><span class="doc">File Upload Class</span></a>.</li>
2898  <li>Added set_status_header() function to <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/output.html"><span class="doc">Output
2899  class</span></a>.</li>
