2900  <li>Modified <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/pagination.html"><span class="doc">Pagination</span></a> class to only
2901  output the “First” link when the link for page one would not be
2902  shown.</li>
2903  <li>Added support for mb_strlen in the <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/form_validation.html"><span class="doc">Form
2904  Validation</span></a> class so that
2905  multi-byte languages will calculate string lengths properly.</li>
2906  </ul>
2907  </li>
2908  <li>Database<ul>
2909  <li>Improved Active Record class to allow full path column and table
2910  names: hostname.database.table.column. Also improved the alias
2911  handling.</li>
2912  <li>Improved how table and column names are escaped and prefixed. It
2913  now honors full path names when adding prefixes and escaping.</li>
2914  <li>Added Active Record caching feature to “update” and “delete”
2915  functions.</li>
2916  <li>Added removal of non-printing control characters in escape_str()
2917  of DB drivers that do not have native PHP escaping mechanisms
2918  (mssql, oci8, odbc), to avoid potential SQL errors, and possible
2919  sources of SQL injection.</li>
2920  <li>Added port support to MySQL, MySQLi, and MS SQL database drivers.</li>
2921  <li>Added driver name variable in each DB driver, based on bug report
2922  #4436.</li>
2923  </ul>
2924  </li>
2925  <li>Helpers<ul>
2926  <li>Added several new “setting” functions to the <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/form_helper.html"><span class="doc">Form
2927  helper</span></a> that allow POST data to be
2928  retrieved and set into forms. These are intended to be used on
2929  their own, or with the new <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/form_validation.html"><span class="doc">Form Validation
2930  Class</span></a>.</li>
2931  <li>Added current_url() and uri_segments() to <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/url_helper.html"><span class="doc">URL
2932  helper</span></a>.</li>
2933  <li>Altered auto_link() in the <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/url_helper.html"><span class="doc">URL
2934  helper</span></a> so that email addresses with
2935  “+” included will be linked.</li>
2936  <li>Added meta() function to <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/html_helper.html"><span class="doc">HTML
2937  helper</span></a>.</li>
2938  <li>Improved accuracy of calculations in <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/number_helper.html"><span class="doc">Number
2939  helper</span></a>.</li>
2940  <li>Removed added newlines (“\n”) from most form and html helper
2941  functions.</li>
2942  <li>Tightened up validation in the <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/date_helper.html"><span class="doc">Date
2943  helper</span></a> function human_to_unix(),
2944  and eliminated the POSIX regex.</li>
2945  <li>Updated <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/date_helper.html"><span class="doc">Date helper</span></a> to match the
2946  world’s current time zones and offsets.</li>
2947  <li>Modified url_title() in the <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/url_helper.html"><span class="doc">URL
2948  helper</span></a> to remove characters and digits
2949  that are part of character entities, to allow dashes, underscores,
2950  and periods regardless of the $separator, and to allow uppercase
2951  characters.</li>
2952  <li>Added support for arbitrary attributes in anchor_popup() of the
2953  <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/url_helper.html"><span class="doc">URL helper</span></a>.</li>
2954  </ul>
2955  </li>
2956  <li>Other Changes<ul>
2957  <li>Added <a class="reference internal" href="general/styleguide.html"><span class="doc">PHP Style Guide</span></a> to docs.</li>
2958  <li>Added sanitization in xss_clean() for a deprecated HTML tag that
2959  could be abused in user input in Internet Explorer.</li>
2960  <li>Added a few openxml document mime types, and an additional mobile
2961  agent to mimes.php and user_agents.php respectively.</li>
2962  <li>Added a file lock check during caching, before trying to write to
2963  the file.</li>
2964  <li>Modified Cookie key cleaning to unset a few troublesome key names
2965  that can be present in certain environments, preventing CI from
2966  halting execution.</li>
2967  <li>Changed the output of the profiler to use style attribute rather
2968  than clear, and added the id “codeigniter_profiler” to the
2969  container div.</li>
2970  </ul>
2971  </li>
2972  </ul>
2973  <div class="section" id="bug-fixes-for-1-7-0">
2974  <h3>Bug fixes for 1.7.0<a class="headerlink" href="#bug-fixes-for-1-7-0" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h3>
2975  <ul class="simple">
2976  <li>Fixed bug in xss_clean() that could remove some desirable tag
2977  attributes.</li>
2978  <li>Fixed assorted user guide typos or examples (#4807, #4812, #4840,
2979  #4862, #4864, #4899, #4930, #5006, #5071, #5158, #5229, #5254,
2980  #5351).</li>
2981  <li>Fixed an edit from 1.6.3 that made the $robots array in
2982  user_agents.php go poof.</li>
2983  <li>Fixed a bug in the <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/email.html"><span class="doc">Email library</span></a> with
2984  quoted-printable encoding improperly encoding space and tab
2985  characters.</li>
2986  <li>Modified XSS sanitization to no longer add semicolons after &amp;[single
2987  letter], such as in M&amp;M’s, B&amp;B, etc.</li>
2988  <li>Modified XSS sanitization to no longer strip XHTML image tags of
2989  closing slashes.</li>
2990  <li>Fixed a bug in the Session class when database sessions are used
2991  where upon session update all userdata would be errantly written to
2992  the session cookie.</li>
2993  <li>Fixed a bug (#4536) in backups with the MySQL driver where some
2994  legacy code was causing certain characters to be double escaped.</li>
2995  <li>Fixed a routing bug (#4661) that occurred when the default route
2996  pointed to a subfolder.</li>
2997  <li>Fixed the spelling of “Dhaka” in the timezone_menu() function of the
2998  <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/date_helper.html"><span class="doc">Date helper.</span></a></li>
2999  <li>Fixed the spelling of “raspberry” in config/smileys.php.</li>
3000  <li>Fixed incorrect parenthesis in form_open() function (#5135).</li>
3001  <li>Fixed a bug that was ignoring case when comparing controller methods
3002  (#4560).</li>
3003  <li>Fixed a bug (#4615) that was not setting SMTP authorization settings
3004  when using the initialize function.</li>
3005  <li>Fixed a bug in highlight_code() in the <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/text_helper.html"><span class="doc">Text
3006  helper</span></a> that would leave a stray &lt;/span&gt;
3007  in certain cases.</li>
3008  <li>Fixed Oracle bug (#3306) that was preventing multiple queries in one
3009  action.</li>
3010  <li>Fixed ODBC bug that was ignoring connection params due to its use of
3011  a constructor.</li>
3012  <li>Fixed a DB driver bug with num_rows() that would cause an error with
3013  the Oracle driver.</li>
3014  <li>Fixed MS SQL bug (#4915). Added brackets around database name in MS
3015  SQL driver when selecting the database, in the event that reserved
3016  characters are used in the name.</li>
3017  <li>Fixed a DB caching bug (4718) in which the path was incorrect when no
3018  URI segments were present.</li>
3019  <li>Fixed Image_lib class bug #4562. A path was not defined for NetPBM.</li>
3020  <li>Fixed Image_lib class bug #4532. When cropping an image with
3021  identical height/width settings on output, a copy is made.</li>
3022  <li>Fixed DB_driver bug (4900), in which a database error was not being
3023  logged correctly.</li>
3024  <li>Fixed DB backup bug in which field names were not being escaped.</li>
3025  <li>Fixed a DB Active Record caching bug in which multiple calls to
3026  cached data were not being honored.</li>
3027  <li>Fixed a bug in the Session class that was disallowing slashes in the
3028  serialized array.</li>
3029  <li>Fixed a Form Validation bug in which the “isset” error message was
3030  being trigged by the “required” rule.</li>
3031  <li>Fixed a spelling error in a Loader error message.</li>
3032  <li>Fixed a bug (5050) with IP validation with empty segments.</li>
3033  <li>Fixed a bug in which the parser was being greedy if multiple
3034  identical sets of tags were encountered.</li>
3035  </ul>
3036  </div>
3037  </div>
3038  <div class="section" id="version-1-6-3">
3039  <h2>Version 1.6.3<a class="headerlink" href="#version-1-6-3" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
3040  <p>Release Date: June 26, 2008
3041  Hg Tag: v1.6.3</p>
3042  <p>Version 1.6.3 is a security and maintenance release and is recommended
3043  for all users.</p>
3044  <ul class="simple">
3045  <li>Database<ul>
3046  <li>Modified MySQL/MySQLi Forge class to give explicit names to keys</li>
3047  <li>Added ability to set multiple column non-primary keys to the
3048  <a class="reference internal" href="database/forge.html"><span class="doc">Forge class</span></a></li>
3049  <li>Added ability to set additional database config values in <a class="reference internal" href="database/connecting.html"><span class="doc">DSN
3050  connections</span></a> via the query string.</li>
3051  </ul>
3052  </li>
3053  <li>Libraries<ul>
3054  <li>Set the mime type check in the <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/file_uploading.html"><span class="doc">Upload
3055  class</span></a> to reference the global
3056  mimes variable.</li>
3057  <li>Added support for query strings to the <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/pagination.html"><span class="doc">Pagination
3058  class</span></a>, automatically detected or
3059  explicitly declared.</li>
3060  <li>Added get_post() to the <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/input.html"><span class="doc">Input class</span></a>.</li>
3061  <li>Documented get() in the <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/input.html"><span class="doc">Input class</span></a>.</li>
3062  <li>Added the ability to automatically output language items as form
3063  labels in the <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/language.html"><span class="doc">Language class</span></a>.</li>
3064  </ul>
3065  </li>
3066  <li>Helpers<ul>
3067  <li>Added a <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/language_helper.html"><span class="doc">Language helper</span></a>.</li>
3068  <li>Added a <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/number_helper.html"><span class="doc">Number helper</span></a>.</li>
3069  <li><a class="reference internal" href="helpers/form_helper.html"><span class="doc">Form helper</span></a> refactored to allow
3070  form_open() and form_fieldset() to accept arrays or strings as
3071  arguments.</li>
3072  </ul>
3073  </li>
3074  <li>Other changes<ul>
3075  <li>Improved security in xss_clean().</li>
3076  <li>Removed an unused Router reference in _display_cache().</li>
3077  <li>Added ability to <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/input.html"><span class="doc">use xss_clean() to test
3078  images</span></a> for XSS, useful for upload
3079  security.</li>
3080  <li>Considerably expanded list of mobile user-agents in
3081  config/user_agents.php.</li>
3082  <li>Charset information in the userguide has been moved above title
3083  for internationalization purposes (#4614).</li>
3084  <li>Added “Using Associative Arrays In a Request Parameter” example to
3085  the <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/xmlrpc.html"><span class="doc">XMLRPC userguide page</span></a>.</li>
3086  <li>Removed maxlength and size as automatically added attributes of
3087  form_input() in the <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/form_helper.html"><span class="doc">form helper</span></a>.</li>
3088  <li>Documented the language file use of byte_format() in the <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/number_helper.html"><span class="doc">number
3089  helper</span></a>.</li>
3090  </ul>
3091  </li>
3092  </ul>
3093  <div class="section" id="bug-fixes-for-1-6-3">
3094  <h3>Bug fixes for 1.6.3<a class="headerlink" href="#bug-fixes-for-1-6-3" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h3>
3095  <ul class="simple">
3096  <li>Added a language key for valid_emails in validation_lang.php.</li>
3097  <li>Amended fixes for bug (#3419) with parsing DSN database connections.</li>
3098  <li>Moved the _has_operator() function (#4535) into DB_driver from
3099  DB_active_rec.</li>
3100  <li>Fixed a syntax error in upload_lang.php.</li>
3101  <li>Fixed a bug (#4542) with a regular expression in the Image library.</li>
3102  <li>Fixed a bug (#4561) where orhaving() wasn’t properly passing values.</li>
3103  <li>Removed some unused variables from the code (#4563).</li>
3104  <li>Fixed a bug where having() was not adding an = into the statement
3105  (#4568).</li>
3106  <li>Fixed assorted user guide typos or examples (#4574, #4706).</li>
3107  <li>Added quoted-printable headers to Email class when the multi-part
3108  override is used.</li>
3109  <li>Fixed a double opening &lt;p&gt; tag in the index pages of each system
3110  directory.</li>
3111  </ul>
3112  </div>
3113  </div>
3114  <div class="section" id="version-1-6-2">
3115  <h2>Version 1.6.2<a class="headerlink" href="#version-1-6-2" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
3116  <p>Release Date: May 13, 2008
3117  Hg Tag: 1.6.2</p>
3118  <ul class="simple">
3119  <li>Active Record<ul>
3120  <li>Added the ability to prevent escaping in having() clauses.</li>
3121  <li>Added rename_table() into <a class="reference internal" href="database/forge.html"><span class="doc">DBForge</span></a>.</li>
3122  <li>Fixed a bug that wasn’t allowing escaping to be turned off if the
3123  value of a query was NULL.</li>
3124  <li>DB Forge is now assigned to any models that exist after loading
3125  (#3457).</li>
3126  </ul>
3127  </li>
3128  <li>Database<ul>
3129  <li>Added <a class="reference internal" href="database/transactions.html"><span class="doc">Strict Mode</span></a> to database
3130  transactions.</li>
3131  <li>Escape behaviour in where() clauses has changed; values in those
3132  with the “FALSE” argument are no longer escaped (ie: quoted).</li>
3133  </ul>
3134  </li>
3135  <li>Config<ul>
3136  <li>Added ‘application/vnd.ms-powerpoint’ to list of mime types.</li>
3137  <li>Added ‘audio/mpg’ to list of mime types.</li>
3138  <li>Added new user-modifiable file constants.php containing file mode
3139  and fopen constants.</li>
3140  <li>Added the ability to set CRLF settings via config in the
3141  <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/email.html"><span class="doc">Email</span></a> class.</li>
3142  </ul>
3143  </li>
3144  <li>Libraries<ul>
3145  <li>Added increased security for filename handling in the Upload
3146  library.</li>
3147  <li>Added increased security for sessions for client-side data
3148  tampering.</li>
3149  <li>The MySQLi forge class is now in sync with MySQL forge.</li>
3150  <li>Added the ability to set CRLF settings via config in the
3151  <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/email.html"><span class="doc">Email</span></a> class.</li>
3152  <li><a class="reference internal" href="libraries/unit_testing.html"><span class="doc">Unit Testing</span></a> results are now
3153  colour coded, and a change was made to the default template of
3154  results.</li>
3155  <li>Added a valid_emails rule to the Validation class.</li>
3156  <li>The <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/zip.html"><span class="doc">Zip class</span></a> now exits within download().</li>
3157  <li>The <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/zip.html"><span class="doc">Zip class</span></a> has undergone a substantial
3158  re-write for speed and clarity (thanks stanleyxu for the hard work
3159  and code contribution in bug report #3425!)</li>
3160  </ul>
3161  </li>
3162  <li>Helpers<ul>
3163  <li>Added a Compatibility
3164  Helper for using some common
3165  PHP 5 functions safely in applications that might run on PHP 4
3166  servers (thanks Seppo for the hard work and code contribution!)</li>
3167  <li>Added form_button() in the <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/form_helper.html"><span class="doc">Form
3168  helper</span></a>.</li>
3169  <li>Changed the radio() and checkbox() functions to default to not
3170  checked by default.</li>
3171  <li>Added the ability to include an optional HTTP Response Code in the
3172  redirect() function of the <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/url_helper.html"><span class="doc">URL
3173  Helper</span></a>.</li>
3174  <li>Modified img() in the <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/html_helper.html"><span class="doc">HTML Helper</span></a> to
3175  remove an unneeded space (#4208).</li>
3176  <li>Modified anchor() in the <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/url_helper.html"><span class="doc">URL helper</span></a>
3177  to no longer add a default title= attribute (#4209).</li>
3178  <li>The <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/download_helper.html"><span class="doc">Download helper</span></a> now exits
3179  within force_download().</li>
3180  <li>Added get_dir_file_info(), get_file_info(), and
3181  get_mime_by_extension() to the <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/file_helper.html"><span class="doc">File
3182  Helper</span></a>.</li>
3183  <li>Added symbolic_permissions() and octal_permissions() to the
3184  <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/file_helper.html"><span class="doc">File helper</span></a>.</li>
3185  </ul>
3186  </li>
3187  <li>Plugins<ul>
3188  <li>Modified captcha generation to first look for the function
3189  imagecreatetruecolor, and fallback to imagecreate if it isn’t
3190  available (#4226).</li>
3191  </ul>
3192  </li>
3193  <li>Other Changes<ul>
3194  <li>Added ability for <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/input.html"><span class="doc">xss_clean()</span></a> to accept
3195  arrays.</li>
3196  <li>Removed closing PHP tags from all PHP files to avoid accidental
3197  output and potential ‘cannot modify headers’ errors.</li>
3198  <li>Removed “scripts” from the auto-load search path. Scripts were
3199  deprecated in Version 1.4.1 (September 21, 2006). If you still
3200  need to use them for legacy reasons, they must now be manually
3201  loaded in each Controller.</li>
3202  <li>Added a <a class="reference internal" href="general/reserved_names.html"><span class="doc">Reserved Names</span></a> page to
3203  the userguide, and migrated reserved controller names into it.</li>
3204  <li>Added a <a class="reference internal" href="general/common_functions.html"><span class="doc">Common Functions</span></a> page
3205  to the userguide for globally available functions.</li>
3206  <li>Improved security and performance of xss_clean().</li>
3207  </ul>
3208  </li>
3209  </ul>
3210  <div class="section" id="bugfixes-for-1-6-2">
3211  <h3>Bugfixes for 1.6.2<a class="headerlink" href="#bugfixes-for-1-6-2" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h3>
3212  <ul class="simple">
3213  <li>Fixed a bug where SET queries were not being handled as “write”
3214  queries.</li>
3215  <li>Fixed a bug (#3191) with ORIG_PATH_INFO URI parsing.</li>
3216  <li>Fixed a bug in DB Forge, when inserting an id field (#3456).</li>
3217  <li>Fixed a bug in the table library that could cause identically
3218  constructed rows to be dropped (#3459).</li>
3219  <li>Fixed DB Driver and MySQLi result driver checking for resources
3220  instead of objects (#3461).</li>
3221  <li>Fixed an AR_caching error where it wasn’t tracking table aliases
3222  (#3463).</li>
3223  <li>Fixed a bug in AR compiling, where select statements with arguments
3224  got incorrectly escaped (#3478).</li>
3225  <li>Fixed an incorrect documentation of $this-&gt;load-&gt;language (#3520).</li>
3226  <li>Fixed bugs (#3523, #4350) in get_filenames() with recursion and
3227  problems with Windows when $include_path is used.</li>
3228  <li>Fixed a bug (#4153) in the XML-RPC class preventing dateTime.iso8601
3229  from being used.</li>
3230  <li>Fixed an AR bug with or_where_not_in() (#4171).</li>
3231  <li>Fixed a bug with <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/input.html"><span class="doc">xss_clean()</span></a> that would
3232  add semicolons to GET URI variable strings.</li>
3233  <li>Fixed a bug (#4206) in the Directory Helper where the directory
3234  resource was not being closed, and minor improvements.</li>
3235  <li>Fixed a bug in the FTP library where delete_dir() was not working
3236  recursively (#4215).</li>
3237  <li>Fixed a Validation bug when set_rules() is used with a non-array
3238  field name and rule (#4220).</li>
3239  <li>Fixed a bug (#4223) where DB caching would not work for returned DB
3240  objects or multiple DB connections.</li>
3241  <li>Fixed a bug in the Upload library that might output the same error
3242  twice (#4390).</li>
3243  <li>Fixed an AR bug when joining with a table alias and table prefix
3244  (#4400).</li>
3245  <li>Fixed a bug in the DB class testing the $params argument.</li>
3246  <li>Fixed a bug in the Table library where the integer 0 in cell data
3247  would be displayed as a blank cell.</li>
3248  <li>Fixed a bug in link_tag() of the <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/url_helper.html"><span class="doc">URL
3249  helper</span></a> where a key was passed instead of
3250  a value.</li>
3251  <li>Fixed a bug in DB_result::row() that prevented it from returning
3252  individual fields with MySQL NULL values.</li>
3253  <li>Fixed a bug where SMTP emails were not having dot transformation
3254  performed on lines that begin with a dot.</li>
3255  <li>Fixed a bug in display_error() in the DB driver that was
3256  instantiating new Language and Exception objects, and not using the
3257  error heading.</li>
3258  <li>Fixed a bug (#4413) where a URI containing slashes only e.g.
3259  ‘http://example.com/index.php?//’ would result in PHP errors</li>
3260  <li>Fixed an array to string conversion error in the Validation library
3261  (#4425)</li>
3262  <li>Fixed bug (#4451, #4299, #4339) where failed transactions will not
3263  rollback when debug mode is enabled.</li>
3264  <li>Fixed a bug (#4506) with overlay_watermark() in the Image library
3265  preventing support for PNG-24s with alpha transparency</li>
3266  <li>Fixed assorted user guide typos (#3453, #4364, #4379, #4399, #4408,
3267  #4412, #4448, #4488).</li>
3268  </ul>
3269  </div>
3270  </div>
3271  <div class="section" id="version-1-6-1">
3272  <h2>Version 1.6.1<a class="headerlink" href="#version-1-6-1" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
3273  <p>Release Date: February 12, 2008
3274  Hg Tag: 1.6.1</p>
3275  <ul class="simple">
3276  <li>Active Record<ul>
3277  <li>Added <a class="reference internal" href="database/query_builder.html#ar-caching"><span class="std std-ref">Active Record
3278  Caching</span></a>.</li>
3279  <li>Made Active Record fully database-prefix aware.</li>
3280  </ul>
3281  </li>
3282  <li>Database drivers<ul>
3283  <li>Added support for setting client character set and collation for
3284  MySQLi.</li>
3285  </ul>
3286  </li>
3287  <li>Core Changes<ul>
3288  <li>Modified xss_clean() to be more intelligent with its handling of
3289  URL encoded strings.</li>
3290  <li>Added $_SERVER, $_FILES, $_ENV, and $_SESSION to sanitization
3291  of globals.</li>
3292  <li>Added a <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/path_helper.html"><span class="doc">Path Helper</span></a>.</li>
3293  <li>Simplified _reindex_segments() in the URI class.</li>
3294  <li>Escaped the ‘-‘ in the default ‘permitted_uri_chars’ config
3295  item, to prevent errors if developers just try to add additional
3296  characters to the end of the default expression.</li>
3297  <li>Modified method calling to controllers to show a 404 when a
3298  private or protected method is accessed via a URL.</li>
3299  <li>Modified framework initiated 404s to log the controller and method
3300  for invalid requests.</li>
3301  </ul>
3302  </li>
3303  <li>Helpers<ul>
3304  <li>Modified get_filenames() in the File Helper to return FALSE if
3305  the $source_dir is not readable.</li>
3306  </ul>
3307  </li>
3308  </ul>
3309  <div class="section" id="bugfixes-for-1-6-1">
3310  <h3>Bugfixes for 1.6.1<a class="headerlink" href="#bugfixes-for-1-6-1" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h3>
3311  <ul class="simple">
3312  <li>Deprecated is_numeric as a validation rule. Use of numeric and
3313  integer are preferred.</li>
3314  <li>Fixed bug (#3379) in DBForge with SQLite for table creation.</li>
3315  <li>Made Active Record fully database prefix aware (#3384).</li>
3316  <li>Fixed a bug where DBForge was outputting invalid SQL in Postgres by
3317  adding brackets around the tables in FROM.</li>
3318  <li>Changed the behaviour of Active Record’s update() to make the WHERE
3319  clause optional (#3395).</li>
3320  <li>Fixed a bug (#3396) where certain POST variables would cause a PHP
3321  warning.</li>
3322  <li>Fixed a bug in query binding (#3402).</li>
3323  <li>Changed order of SQL keywords in the Profiler $highlight array so OR
3324  would not be highlighted before ORDER BY.</li>
3325  <li>Fixed a bug (#3404) where the MySQLi driver was testing if
3326  $this-&gt;conn_id was a resource instead of an object.</li>
3327  <li>Fixed a bug (#3419) connecting to a database via a DSN string.</li>
3328  <li>Fixed a bug (#3445) where the routed segment array was not re-indexed
3329  to begin with 1 when the default controller is used.</li>
3330  <li>Fixed assorted user guide typos.</li>
3331  </ul>
3332  </div>
3333  </div>
3334  <div class="section" id="version-1-6-0">
3335  <h2>Version 1.6.0<a class="headerlink" href="#version-1-6-0" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
3336  <p>Release Date: January 30, 2008</p>
3337  <ul class="simple">
3338  <li>DBForge<ul>
3339  <li>Added <a class="reference internal" href="database/forge.html"><span class="doc">DBForge</span></a> to the database tools.</li>
3340  <li>Moved create_database() and drop_database() into
3341  <a class="reference internal" href="database/forge.html"><span class="doc">DBForge</span></a>.</li>
3342  <li>Added add_field(), add_key(), create_table(), drop_table(),
3343  add_column(), drop_column(), modify_column() into
3344  <a class="reference internal" href="database/forge.html"><span class="doc">DBForge</span></a>.</li>
3345  </ul>
3346  </li>
3347  <li>Active Record<ul>
3348  <li>Added protect_identifiers() in <a class="reference internal" href="database/query_builder.html"><span class="doc">Active
3349  Record</span></a>.</li>
3350  <li>All AR queries are backticked if appropriate to the database.</li>
3351  <li>Added where_in(), or_where_in(), where_not_in(),
3352  or_where_not_in(), not_like() and or_not_like() to <a class="reference internal" href="database/query_builder.html"><span class="doc">Active
3353  Record</span></a>.</li>
3354  <li>Added support for limit() into update() and delete() statements in
3355  <a class="reference internal" href="database/query_builder.html"><span class="doc">Active Record</span></a>.</li>
3356  <li>Added empty_table() and truncate_table() to <a class="reference internal" href="database/query_builder.html"><span class="doc">Active
3357  Record</span></a>.</li>
3358  <li>Added the ability to pass an array of tables to the delete()
3359  statement in <a class="reference internal" href="database/query_builder.html"><span class="doc">Active Record</span></a>.</li>
3360  <li>Added count_all_results() function to <a class="reference internal" href="database/query_builder.html"><span class="doc">Active
3361  Record</span></a>.</li>
3362  <li>Added select_max(), select_min(), select_avg() and
3363  select_sum() to <a class="reference internal" href="database/query_builder.html"><span class="doc">Active Record</span></a>.</li>
3364  <li>Added the ability to use aliases with joins in <a class="reference internal" href="database/query_builder.html"><span class="doc">Active
3365  Record</span></a>.</li>
3366  <li>Added a third parameter to Active Record’s like() clause to
3367  control where the wildcard goes.</li>
3368  <li>Added a third parameter to set() in <a class="reference internal" href="database/query_builder.html"><span class="doc">Active
3369  Record</span></a> that withholds escaping
3370  data.</li>
3371  <li>Changed the behaviour of variables submitted to the where() clause
3372  with no values to auto set “IS NULL”</li>
3373  </ul>
3374  </li>
3375  <li>Other Database Related<ul>
3376  <li>MySQL driver now requires MySQL 4.1+</li>
3377  <li>Added $this-&gt;DB-&gt;save_queries variable to DB driver, enabling
3378  queries to get saved or not. Previously they were always saved.</li>
3379  <li>Added $this-&gt;db-&gt;dbprefix() to manually add database prefixes.</li>
3380  <li>Added ‘random’ as an order_by() option , and removed “rand()” as
3381  a listed option as it was MySQL only.</li>
3382  <li>Added a check for NULL fields in the MySQL database backup
3383  utility.</li>
3384  <li>Added “constrain_by_prefix” parameter to db-&gt;list_table()
3385  function. If set to TRUE it will limit the result to only table
3386  names with the current prefix.</li>
3387  <li>Deprecated from Active Record; getwhere() for get_where();
3388  groupby() for group_by(); havingor() for having_or(); orderby()
3389  for order_by; orwhere() for or_where(); and orlike() for
3390  or_like().</li>
3391  <li>Modified csv_from_result() to output CSV data more in the spirit
3392  of basic rules of RFC 4180.</li>
3393  <li>Added ‘char_set’ and ‘dbcollat’ database configuration settings,
3394  to explicitly set the client communication properly.</li>
3395  <li>Removed ‘active_r’ configuration setting and replaced with a
3396  global $active_record setting, which is more in harmony with the
3397  global nature of the behavior (#1834).</li>
3398  </ul>
3399  </li>
3400  <li>Core changes<ul>
3401  <li>Added ability to load multiple views, whose content will be
3402  appended to the output in the order loaded.</li>
3403  <li>Added the ability to <a class="reference internal" href="general/autoloader.html"><span class="doc">auto-load</span></a>
3404  <a class="reference internal" href="general/models.html"><span class="doc">Models</span></a>.</li>
3405  <li>Reorganized the URI and Routes classes for better clarity.</li>
3406  <li>Added Compat.php to allow function overrides for older versions of
3407  PHP or PHP environments missing certain extensions / libraries</li>
3408  <li>Added memory usage, GET, URI string data, and individual query
3409  execution time to Profiler output.</li>
3410  <li>Deprecated Scaffolding.</li>
3411  <li>Added is_really_writable() to Common.php to provide a
3412  cross-platform reliable method of testing file/folder writability.</li>
3413  </ul>
3414  </li>
3415  <li>Libraries<ul>
3416  <li>Changed the load protocol of Models to allow for extension.</li>
3417  <li>Strengthened the Encryption library to help protect against man in
3418  the middle attacks when MCRYPT_MODE_CBC mode is used.</li>
3419  <li>Added Flashdata variables, session_id regeneration and
3420  configurable session update times to the <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/sessions.html"><span class="doc">Session
3421  class.</span></a></li>
3422  <li>Removed ‘last_visit’ from the Session class.</li>
3423  <li>Added a language entry for valid_ip validation error.</li>
3424  <li>Modified prep_for_form() in the Validation class to accept
3425  arrays, adding support for POST array validation (via callbacks
3426  only)</li>
3427  <li>Added an “integer” rule into the Validation library.</li>
3428  <li>Added valid_base64() to the Validation library.</li>
3429  <li>Documented clear() in the <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/image_lib.html"><span class="doc">Image
3430  Processing</span></a> library.</li>
3431  <li>Changed the behaviour of custom callbacks so that they no longer
3432  trigger the “required” rule.</li>
3433  <li>Modified Upload class $_FILES error messages to be more precise.</li>
3434  <li>Moved the safe mode and auth checks for the Email library into the
3435  constructor.</li>
3436  <li>Modified variable names in _ci_load() method of Loader class to
3437  avoid conflicts with view variables.</li>
3438  <li>Added a few additional mime type variations for CSV.</li>
3439  <li>Enabled the ‘system’ methods for the XML-RPC Server library,
3440  except for ‘system.multicall’ which is still disabled.</li>
3441  </ul>
3442  </li>
3443  <li>Helpers &amp; Plugins<ul>
3444  <li>Added link_tag() to the <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/html_helper.html"><span class="doc">HTML
3445  helper.</span></a></li>
3446  <li>Added img() to the <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/html_helper.html"><span class="doc">HTML helper.</span></a></li>
3447  <li>Added ability to <a class="reference internal" href="general/helpers.html"><span class="doc">“extend” Helpers</span></a>.</li>
3448  <li>Added an <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/email_helper.html"><span class="doc">email helper</span></a> into core
3449  helpers.</li>
3450  <li>Added strip_quotes() function to <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/string_helper.html"><span class="doc">string
3451  helper</span></a>.</li>
3452  <li>Added reduce_multiples() function to <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/string_helper.html"><span class="doc">string
3453  helper</span></a>.</li>
3454  <li>Added quotes_to_entities() function to <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/string_helper.html"><span class="doc">string
3455  helper</span></a>.</li>
3456  <li>Added form_fieldset(), form_fieldset_close(), form_label(),
3457  and form_reset() function to <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/form_helper.html"><span class="doc">form
3458  helper</span></a>.</li>
3459  <li>Added support for external urls in form_open().</li>
3460  <li>Removed support for db_backup in MySQLi due to incompatible
3461  functions.</li>
3462  <li>Javascript Calendar plugin now uses the months and days from the
3463  calendar language file, instead of hard-coded values,
3464  internationalizing it.</li>
3465  </ul>
3466  </li>
3467  <li>Documentation Changes<ul>
3468  <li>Added Writing Documentation section
3469  for the community to use in writing their own documentation.</li>
3470  <li>Added titles to all user manual pages.</li>
3471  <li>Added attributes into &lt;html&gt; of userguide for valid html.</li>
3472  <li>Added <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/zip.html"><span class="doc">Zip Encoding Class</span></a>
3473  to the table of contents of the userguide.</li>
3474  <li>Moved part of the userguide menu javascript to an external file.</li>
3475  <li>Documented distinct() in <a class="reference internal" href="database/query_builder.html"><span class="doc">Active
3476  Record</span></a>.</li>
3477  <li>Documented the timezones() function in the <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/date_helper.html"><span class="doc">Date
3478  Helper</span></a>.</li>
3479  <li>Documented unset_userdata in the <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/sessions.html"><span class="doc">Session
3480  class</span></a>.</li>
3481  <li>Documented 2 config options to the <a class="reference internal" href="database/configuration.html"><span class="doc">Database
3482  configuration</span></a> page.</li>
3483  </ul>
3484  </li>
3485  </ul>
3486  <div class="section" id="bug-fixes-for-version-1-6-0">
3487  <h3>Bug fixes for Version 1.6.0<a class="headerlink" href="#bug-fixes-for-version-1-6-0" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h3>
3488  <ul class="simple">
3489  <li>Fixed a bug (#1813) preventing using $CI-&gt;db in the same application
3490  with returned database objects.</li>
3491  <li>Fixed a bug (#1842) where the $this-&gt;uri-&gt;rsegments array would not
3492  include the ‘index’ method if routed to the controller without an
3493  implicit method.</li>
3494  <li>Fixed a bug (#1872) where word_limiter() was not retaining
3495  whitespace.</li>
3496  <li>Fixed a bug (#1890) in csv_from_result() where content that
3497  included the delimiter would break the file.</li>
3498  <li>Fixed a bug (#2542)in the clean_email() method of the Email class to
3499  allow for non-numeric / non-sequential array keys.</li>
3500  <li>Fixed a bug (#2545) in _html_entity_decode_callback() when
3501  ‘global_xss_filtering’ is enabled.</li>
3502  <li>Fixed a bug (#2668) in the <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/parser.html"><span class="doc">parser class</span></a>
3503  where numeric data was ignored.</li>
3504  <li>Fixed a bug (#2679) where the “previous” pagination link would get
3505  drawn on the first page.</li>
3506  <li>Fixed a bug (#2702) in _object_to_array that broke some types of
3507  inserts and updates.</li>
3508  <li>Fixed a bug (#2732) in the SQLite driver for PHP 4.</li>
3509  <li>Fixed a bug (#2754) in Pagination to scan for non-positive
3510  num_links.</li>
3511  <li>Fixed a bug (#2762) in the <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/sessions.html"><span class="doc">Session
3512  library</span></a> where user agent matching would
3513  fail on user agents ending with a space.</li>
3514  <li>Fixed a bug (#2784) $field_names[] vs $Ffield_names[] in postgres
3515  and sqlite drivers.</li>
3516  <li>Fixed a bug (#2810) in the typography helper causing extraneous
3517  paragraph tags when string contains tags.</li>
3518  <li>Fixed a bug (#2849) where arguments passed to a subfolder controller
3519  method would be incorrectly shifted, dropping the 3rd segment value.</li>
3520  <li>Fixed a bug (#2858) which referenced a wrong variable in the Image
3521  class.</li>
3522  <li>Fixed a bug (#2875)when loading plugin files as _plugin. and not
3523  _pi.</li>
3524  <li>Fixed a bug (#2912) in get_filenames() in the <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/file_helper.html"><span class="doc">File
3525  Helper</span></a> where the array wasn’t cleared
3526  after each call.</li>
3527  <li>Fixed a bug (#2974) in highlight_phrase() that caused an error with
3528  slashes.</li>
3529  <li>Fixed a bug (#3003) in the Encryption Library to support modes other
3530  than MCRYPT_MODE_ECB</li>
3531  <li>Fixed a bug (#3015) in the <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/user_agent.html"><span class="doc">User Agent
3532  library</span></a> where more than 2 languages
3533  where not reported with languages().</li>
3534  <li>Fixed a bug (#3017) in the <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/email.html"><span class="doc">Email</span></a> library
3535  where some timezones were calculated incorrectly.</li>
3536  <li>Fixed a bug (#3024) in which master_dim wasn’t getting reset by
3537  clear() in the Image library.</li>
3538  <li>Fixed a bug (#3156) in Text Helper highlight_code() causing PHP tags
3539  to be handled incorrectly.</li>
3540  <li>Fixed a bug (#3166) that prevented num_rows from working in Oracle.</li>
3541  <li>Fixed a bug (#3175) preventing certain libraries from working
3542  properly when autoloaded in PHP 4.</li>
3543  <li>Fixed a bug (#3267) in the Typography Helper where unordered list was
3544  listed “un.</li>
3545  <li>Fixed a bug (#3268) where the Router could leave ‘/’ as the path.</li>
3546  <li>Fixed a bug (#3279) where the Email class was sending the wrong
3547  Content-Transfer-Encoding for some character sets.</li>
3548  <li>Fixed a bug (#3284) where the rsegment array would not be set
3549  properly if the requested URI contained more segments than the routed
3550  URI.</li>
3551  <li>Removed extraneous load of $CFG in _display_cache() of the Output
3552  class (#3285).</li>
3553  <li>Removed an extraneous call to loading models (#3286).</li>
3554  <li>Fixed a bug (#3310) with sanitization of globals in the Input class
3555  that could unset CI’s global variables.</li>
3556  <li>Fixed a bug (#3314) which would cause the top level path to be
3557  deleted in delete_files() of the File helper.</li>
3558  <li>Fixed a bug (#3328) where the smiley helper might return an undefined
3559  variable.</li>
3560  <li>Fixed a bug (#3330) in the FTP class where a comparison wasn’t
3561  getting made.</li>
3562  <li>Removed an unused parameter from Profiler (#3332).</li>
3563  <li>Fixed a bug in database driver where num_rows property wasn’t
3564  getting updated.</li>
3565  <li>Fixed a bug in the <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/file_uploading.html"><span class="doc">upload
3566  library</span></a> when allowed_files
3567  wasn’t defined.</li>
3568  <li>Fixed a bug in word_wrap() of the Text Helper that incorrectly
3569  referenced an object.</li>
3570  <li>Fixed a bug in Validation where valid_ip() wasn’t called properly.</li>
3571  <li>Fixed a bug in Validation where individual error messages for
3572  checkboxes wasn’t supported.</li>
3573  <li>Fixed a bug in captcha calling an invalid PHP function.</li>
3574  <li>Fixed a bug in the cookie helper “set_cookie” function. It was not
3575  honoring the config settings.</li>
3576  <li>Fixed a bug that was making validation callbacks required even when
3577  not set as such.</li>
3578  <li>Fixed a bug in the XML-RPC library so if a type is specified, a more
3579  intelligent decision is made as to the default type.</li>
3580  <li>Fixed an example of comma-separated emails in the email library
3581  documentation.</li>
3582  <li>Fixed an example in the Calendar library for Showing Next/Previous
3583  Month Links.</li>
3584  <li>Fixed a typo in the database language file.</li>
3585  <li>Fixed a typo in the image language file “suppor” to “support”.</li>
3586  <li>Fixed an example for XML RPC.</li>
3587  <li>Fixed an example of accept_charset() in the <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/user_agent.html"><span class="doc">User Agent
3588  Library</span></a>.</li>
3589  <li>Fixed a typo in the docblock comments that had CodeIgniter spelled
3590  CodeIgnitor.</li>
3591  <li>Fixed a typo in the <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/string_helper.html"><span class="doc">String Helper</span></a>
3592  (uniquid changed to uniqid).</li>
3593  <li>Fixed typos in the email Language class
3594  (email_attachment_unredable, email_filed_smtp_login), and FTP
3595  Class (ftp_unable_to_remame).</li>
3596  <li>Added a stripslashes() into the Upload Library.</li>
3597  <li>Fixed a series of grammatical and spelling errors in the language
3598  files.</li>
3599  <li>Fixed assorted user guide typos.</li>
3600  </ul>
3601  </div>
3602  </div>
3603  <div class="section" id="version-1-5-4">
3604  <h2>Version 1.5.4<a class="headerlink" href="#version-1-5-4" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
3605  <p>Release Date: July 12, 2007</p>
3606  <ul class="simple">
3607  <li>Added <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/language.html"><span class="doc">custom Language files</span></a> to the
3608  <a class="reference internal" href="general/autoloader.html"><span class="doc">autoload</span></a> options.</li>
3609  <li>Added stripslashes() to the _clean_input_data() function in the
3610  <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/input.html"><span class="doc">Input class</span></a> when magic quotes is on so
3611  that data will always be un-slashed within the framework.</li>
3612  <li>Added array to string into the <a class="reference internal" href="general/profiling.html"><span class="doc">profiler</span></a>.</li>
3613  <li>Added some additional mime types in application/config/mimes.php.</li>
3614  <li>Added filename_security() method to <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/input.html"><span class="doc">Input
3615  library</span></a>.</li>
3616  <li>Added some additional arguments to the <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/inflector_helper.html"><span class="doc">Inflection
3617  helper</span></a> singular() to compensate
3618  for words ending in “s”. Also added a force parameter to pluralize().</li>
3619  <li>Added $config[‘charset’] to the config file. Default value is
3620  ‘UTF-8’, used in some string handling functions.</li>
3621  <li>Fixed MSSQL insert_id().</li>
3622  <li>Fixed a logic error in the DB trans_status() function. It was
3623  incorrectly returning TRUE on failure and FALSE on success.</li>
3624  <li>Fixed a bug that was allowing multiple load attempts on extended
3625  classes.</li>
3626  <li>Fixed a bug in the bootstrap file that was incorrectly attempting to
3627  discern the full server path even when it was explicity set by the
3628  user.</li>
3629  <li>Fixed a bug in the escape_str() function in the MySQL driver.</li>
3630  <li>Fixed a typo in the <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/calendar.html"><span class="doc">Calendar library</span></a></li>
3631  <li>Fixed a typo in rpcs.php library</li>
3632  <li>Fixed a bug in the <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/zip.html"><span class="doc">Zip library</span></a>, providing
3633  PC Zip file compatibility with Mac OS X</li>
3634  <li>Fixed a bug in router that was ignoring the scaffolding route for
3635  optimization</li>
3636  <li>Fixed an IP validation bug.</li>
3637  <li>Fixed a bug in display of POST keys in the
3638  <a class="reference internal" href="general/profiling.html"><span class="doc">Profiler</span></a> output</li>
3639  <li>Fixed a bug in display of queries with characters that would be
3640  interpreted as HTML in the <a class="reference internal" href="general/profiling.html"><span class="doc">Profiler</span></a>
3641  output</li>
3642  <li>Fixed a bug in display of Email class print debugger with characters
3643  that would be interpreted as HTML in the debugging output</li>
3644  <li>Fixed a bug in the Content-Transfer-Encoding of HTML emails with the
3645  quoted-printable MIME type</li>
3646  <li>Fixed a bug where one could unset certain PHP superglobals by setting
3647  them via GET or POST data</li>
3648  <li>Fixed an undefined function error in the insert_id() function of the
3649  PostgreSQL driver</li>
3650  <li>Fixed various doc typos.</li>
3651  <li>Documented two functions from the <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/string_helper.html"><span class="doc">String
3652  helper</span></a> that were missing from the
3653  user guide: trim_slashes() and reduce_double_slashes().</li>
3654  <li>Docs now validate to XHTML 1 transitional</li>
3655  <li>Updated the XSS Filtering to take into account the IE expression()
3656  ability and improved certain deletions to prevent possible exploits</li>
3657  <li>Modified the Router so that when Query Strings are Enabled, the
3658  controller trigger and function trigger values are sanitized for
3659  filename include security.</li>
3660  <li>Modified the is_image() method in the Upload library to take into
3661  account Windows IE 6/7 eccentricities when dealing with MIMEs</li>
3662  <li>Modified XSS Cleaning routine to be more performance friendly and
3663  compatible with PHP 5.2’s new PCRE backtrack and recursion limits.</li>
3664  <li>Modified the <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/url_helper.html"><span class="doc">URL Helper</span></a> to type cast
3665  the $title as a string in case a numeric value is supplied</li>
3666  <li>Modified Form Helper form_dropdown() to type cast the keys and
3667  values of the options array as strings, allowing numeric values to be
3668  properly set as ‘selected’</li>
3669  <li>Deprecated the use if is_numeric() in various places since it allows
3670  periods. Due to compatibility problems with ctype_digit(), making it
3671  unreliable in some installations, the following regular expression
3672  was used instead: preg_match(“/[^0-9]/”, $n)</li>
3673  <li>Deprecated: APPVER has been deprecated and replaced with CI_VERSION
3674  for clarity.</li>
3675  </ul>
3676  </div>
3677  <div class="section" id="version-1-5-3">
3678  <h2>Version 1.5.3<a class="headerlink" href="#version-1-5-3" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
3679  <p>Release Date: April 15, 2007</p>
3680  <ul class="simple">
3681  <li>Added array to string into the profiler</li>
3682  <li>Code Igniter references updated to CodeIgniter</li>
3683  <li>pMachine references updated to EllisLab</li>
3684  <li>Fixed a bug in the repeater function of <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/string_helper.html"><span class="doc">string
3685  helper</span></a>.</li>
3686  <li>Fixed a bug in ODBC driver</li>
3687  <li>Fixed a bug in result_array() that was returning an empty array when
3688  no result is produced.</li>
3689  <li>Fixed a bug in the redirect function of the <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/url_helper.html"><span class="doc">url
3690  helper</span></a>.</li>
3691  <li>Fixed an undefined variable in Loader</li>
3692  <li>Fixed a version bug in the Postgres driver</li>
3693  <li>Fixed a bug in the textarea function of the form helper for use with
3694  strings</li>
3695  <li>Fixed doc typos.</li>
3696  </ul>
3697  </div>
3698  <div class="section" id="version-1-5-2">
3699  <h2>Version 1.5.2<a class="headerlink" href="#version-1-5-2" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
3700  <p>Release Date: February 13, 2007</p>
3701  <ul class="simple">
3702  <li>Added subversion information
3703  to the <a class="reference internal" href="installation/downloads.html"><span class="doc">downloads</span></a> page.</li>
3704  <li>Added support for captions in the <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/table.html"><span class="doc">Table
3705  Library</span></a></li>
3706  <li>Fixed a bug in the
3707  <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/download_helper.html"><span class="doc">download_helper</span></a> that was causing
3708  Internet Explorer to load rather than download</li>
3709  <li>Fixed a bug in the Active Record Join function that was not taking
3710  table prefixes into consideration.</li>
3711  <li>Removed unescaped variables in error messages of Input and Router
3712  classes</li>
3713  <li>Fixed a bug in the Loader that was causing errors on Libraries loaded
3714  twice. A debug message is now silently made in the log.</li>
3715  <li>Fixed a bug in the <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/form_helper.html"><span class="doc">form helper</span></a> that
3716  gave textarea a value attribute</li>
3717  <li>Fixed a bug in the <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/image_lib.html"><span class="doc">Image Library</span></a> that
3718  was ignoring resizing the same size image</li>
3719  <li>Fixed some doc typos.</li>
3720  </ul>
3721  </div>
3722  <div class="section" id="version-1-5-1">
3723  <h2>Version 1.5.1<a class="headerlink" href="#version-1-5-1" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
3724  <p>Release Date: November 23, 2006</p>
3725  <ul class="simple">
3726  <li>Added support for submitting arrays of libraries in the
3727  $this-&gt;load-&gt;library function.</li>
3728  <li>Added support for naming custom library files in lower or uppercase.</li>
3729  <li>Fixed a bug related to output buffering.</li>
3730  <li>Fixed a bug in the active record class that was not resetting query
3731  data after a completed query.</li>
3732  <li>Fixed a bug that was suppressing errors in controllers.</li>
3733  <li>Fixed a problem that can cause a loop to occur when the config file
3734  is missing.</li>
3735  <li>Fixed a bug that occurred when multiple models were loaded with the
3736  third parameter set to TRUE.</li>
3737  <li>Fixed an oversight that was not unsetting globals properly in the
3738  input sanitize function.</li>
3739  <li>Fixed some bugs in the Oracle DB driver.</li>
3740  <li>Fixed an incorrectly named variable in the MySQLi result driver.</li>
3741  <li>Fixed some doc typos.</li>
3742  </ul>
3743  </div>
3744  <div class="section" id="version-1-5-0-1">
3745  <h2>Version 1.5.0.1<a class="headerlink" href="#version-1-5-0-1" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
3746  <p>Release Date: October 31, 2006</p>
3747  <ul class="simple">
3748  <li>Fixed a problem in which duplicate attempts to load helpers and
3749  classes were not being stopped.</li>
3750  <li>Fixed a bug in the word_wrap() helper function.</li>
3751  <li>Fixed an invalid color Hex number in the Profiler class.</li>
3752  <li>Fixed a corrupted image in the user guide.</li>
3753  </ul>
3754  </div>
3755  <div class="section" id="version-1-5-0">
3756  <h2>Version 1.5.0<a class="headerlink" href="#version-1-5-0" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
3757  <p>Release Date: October 30, 2006</p>
3758  <ul class="simple">
3759  <li>Added <a class="reference internal" href="database/utilities.html"><span class="doc">DB utility class</span></a>, permitting DB
3760  backups, CVS or XML files from DB results, and various other
3761  functions.</li>
3762  <li>Added <a class="reference internal" href="database/caching.html"><span class="doc">Database Caching Class</span></a>.</li>
3763  <li>Added <a class="reference internal" href="database/transactions.html"><span class="doc">transaction support</span></a> to the
3764  database classes.</li>
3765  <li>Added <a class="reference internal" href="general/profiling.html"><span class="doc">Profiler Class</span></a> which generates a
3766  report of Benchmark execution times, queries, and POST data at the
3767  bottom of your pages.</li>
3768  <li>Added <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/user_agent.html"><span class="doc">User Agent Library</span></a> which
3769  allows browsers, robots, and mobile devises to be identified.</li>
3770  <li>Added <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/table.html"><span class="doc">HTML Table Class</span></a> , enabling tables
3771  to be generated from arrays or database results.</li>
3772  <li>Added <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/zip.html"><span class="doc">Zip Encoding Library</span></a>.</li>
3773  <li>Added <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/ftp.html"><span class="doc">FTP Library</span></a>.</li>
3774  <li>Added the ability to <a class="reference internal" href="general/creating_libraries.html"><span class="doc">extend
3775  libraries</span></a> and <a class="reference internal" href="general/core_classes.html"><span class="doc">extend core
3776  classes</span></a>, in addition to being able to
3777  replace them.</li>
3778  <li>Added support for storing <a class="reference internal" href="general/models.html"><span class="doc">models within
3779  sub-folders</span></a>.</li>
3780  <li>Added <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/download_helper.html"><span class="doc">Download Helper</span></a>.</li>
3781  <li>Added <a class="reference internal" href="database/queries.html"><span class="doc">simple_query()</span></a> function to the
3782  database classes</li>
3783  <li>Added <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/date_helper.html"><span class="doc">standard_date()</span></a> function to
3784  the Date Helper.</li>
3785  <li>Added <a class="reference internal" href="database/results.html"><span class="doc">$query-&gt;free_result()</span></a> to database
3786  class.</li>
3787  <li>Added <a class="reference internal" href="database/metadata.html"><span class="doc">$query-&gt;list_fields()</span></a> function to
3788  database class</li>
3789  <li>Added <a class="reference internal" href="database/helpers.html"><span class="doc">$this-&gt;db-&gt;platform()</span></a> function</li>
3790  <li>Added new <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/file_helper.html"><span class="doc">File Helper</span></a>:
3791  get_filenames()</li>
3792  <li>Added new helper: <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/smiley_helper.html"><span class="doc">Smiley Helper</span></a></li>
3793  <li>Added support for &lt;ul&gt; and &lt;ol&gt; lists in the <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/html_helper.html"><span class="doc">HTML
3794  Helper</span></a></li>
3795  <li>Added the ability to rewrite <a class="reference internal" href="general/alternative_php.html"><span class="doc">short
3796  tags</span></a> on-the-fly, converting them
3797  to standard PHP statements, for those servers that do not support
3798  short tags. This allows the cleaner syntax to be used regardless of
3799  whether it’s supported by the server.</li>
3800  <li>Added the ability to <a class="reference internal" href="general/managing_apps.html"><span class="doc">rename or relocate the “application”
3801  folder</span></a>.</li>
3802  <li>Added more thorough initialization in the upload class so that all
3803  class variables are reset.</li>
3804  <li>Added “is_numeric” to validation, which uses the native PHP
3805  is_numeric function.</li>
3806  <li>Improved the URI handler to make it more reliable when the
3807  $config[‘uri_protocol’] item is set to AUTO.</li>
3808  <li>Moved most of the functions in the Controller class into the Loader
3809  class, allowing fewer reserved function names for controllers when
3810  running under PHP 5.</li>
3811  <li>Updated the DB Result class to return an empty array when
3812  $query-&gt;result() doesn’t produce a result.</li>
3813  <li>Updated the input-&gt;cookie() and input-&gt;post() functions in <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/input.html"><span class="doc">Input
3814  Class</span></a> to permit arrays contained cookies
3815  that are arrays to be run through the XSS filter.</li>
3816  <li>Documented three functions from the Validation
3817  class that were missing from the user
3818  guide: set_select(), set_radio(), and set_checkbox().</li>
3819  <li>Fixed a bug in the Email class related to SMTP Helo data.</li>
3820  <li>Fixed a bug in the word wrapping helper and function in the email
3821  class.</li>
3822  <li>Fixed a bug in the validation class.</li>
3823  <li>Fixed a bug in the typography helper that was incorrectly wrapping
3824  block level elements in paragraph tags.</li>
3825  <li>Fixed a problem in the form_prep() function that was double encoding
3826  entities.</li>
3827  <li>Fixed a bug that affects some versions of PHP when output buffering
3828  is nested.</li>
3829  <li>Fixed a bug that caused CI to stop working when the PHP magic
3830  __get() or __set() functions were used within models or
3831  controllers.</li>
3832  <li>Fixed a pagination bug that was permitting negative values in the
3833  URL.</li>
3834  <li>Fixed an oversight in which the Loader class was not allowed to be
3835  extended.</li>
3836  <li>Changed _get_config() to get_config() since the function is not a
3837  private one.</li>
3838  <li><strong>Deprecated “init” folder</strong>. Initialization happens automatically
3839  now. <a class="reference internal" href="general/creating_libraries.html"><span class="doc">Please see documentation</span></a>.</li>
3840  <li><strong>Deprecated</strong> $this-&gt;db-&gt;field_names() USE
3841  $this-&gt;db-&gt;list_fields()</li>
3842  <li><strong>Deprecated</strong> the $config[‘log_errors’] item from the config.php
3843  file. Instead, $config[‘log_threshold’] can be set to “0” to turn it
3844  off.</li>
3845  </ul>
3846  </div>
3847  <div class="section" id="version-1-4-1">
3848  <h2>Version 1.4.1<a class="headerlink" href="#version-1-4-1" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
3849  <p>Release Date: September 21, 2006</p>
3850  <ul class="simple">
3851  <li>Added a new feature that passes URI segments directly to your
3852  function calls as parameters. See the
3853  <a class="reference internal" href="general/controllers.html"><span class="doc">Controllers</span></a> page for more info.</li>
3854  <li>Added support for a function named _output(), which when used in
3855  your controllers will received the final rendered output from the
3856  output class. More info in the <a class="reference internal" href="general/controllers.html"><span class="doc">Controllers</span></a>
3857  page.</li>
3858  <li>Added several new functions in the <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/uri.html"><span class="doc">URI
3859  Class</span></a> to let you retrieve and manipulate URI
3860  segments that have been re-routed using the <a class="reference internal" href="general/routing.html"><span class="doc">URI
3861  Routing</span></a> feature. Previously, the URI class did not
3862  permit you to access any re-routed URI segments, but now it does.</li>
3863  <li>Added <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/output.html"><span class="doc">$this-&gt;output-&gt;set_header()</span></a>
3864  function, which allows you to set server headers.</li>
3865  <li>Updated plugins, helpers, and language classes to allow your
3866  application folder to contain its own plugins, helpers, and language
3867  folders. Previously they were always treated as global for your
3868  entire installation. If your application folder contains any of these
3869  resources they will be used <em>instead</em> the global ones.</li>
3870  <li>Added <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/inflector_helper.html"><span class="doc">Inflector helper</span></a>.</li>
3871  <li>Added element() function in the <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/array_helper.html"><span class="doc">array
3872  helper</span></a>.</li>
3873  <li>Added RAND() to active record orderby() function.</li>
3874  <li>Added delete_cookie() and get_cookie() to <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/cookie_helper.html"><span class="doc">Cookie
3875  helper</span></a>, even though the input class
3876  has a cookie fetching function.</li>
3877  <li>Added Oracle database driver (still undergoing testing so it might
3878  have some bugs).</li>
3879  <li>Added the ability to combine pseudo-variables and php variables in
3880  the template parser class.</li>
3881  <li>Added output compression option to the config file.</li>
3882  <li>Removed the is_numeric test from the db-&gt;escape() function.</li>
3883  <li>Fixed a MySQLi bug that was causing error messages not to contain
3884  proper error data.</li>
3885  <li>Fixed a bug in the email class which was causing it to ignore
3886  explicitly set alternative headers.</li>
3887  <li>Fixed a bug that was causing a PHP error when the Exceptions class
3888  was called within the get_config() function since it was causing
3889  problems.</li>
3890  <li>Fixed an oversight in the cookie helper in which the config file
3891  cookie settings were not being honored.</li>
3892  <li>Fixed an oversight in the upload class. An item mentioned in the 1.4
3893  changelog was missing.</li>
3894  <li>Added some code to allow email attachments to be reset when sending
3895  batches of email.</li>
3896  <li>Deprecated the application/scripts folder. It will continue to work
3897  for legacy users, but it is recommended that you create your own
3898  <a class="reference internal" href="general/libraries.html"><span class="doc">libraries</span></a> or
3899  <a class="reference internal" href="general/models.html"><span class="doc">models</span></a> instead. It was originally added
3900  before CI had user libraries or models, but it’s not needed anymore.</li>
3901  <li>Deprecated the $autoload[‘core’] item from the autoload.php file.
3902  Instead, please now use: $autoload[‘libraries’]</li>
3903  <li>Deprecated the following database functions:
3904  $this-&gt;db-&gt;smart_escape_str() and $this-&gt;db-&gt;fields().</li>
3905  </ul>
3906  </div>
3907  <div class="section" id="version-1-4-0">
3908  <h2>Version 1.4.0<a class="headerlink" href="#version-1-4-0" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
3909  <p>Release Date: September 17, 2006</p>
3910  <ul class="simple">
3911  <li>Added <a class="reference internal" href="general/hooks.html"><span class="doc">Hooks</span></a> feature, enabling you to tap
3912  into and modify the inner workings of the framework without hacking
3913  the core files.</li>
3914  <li>Added the ability to organize controller files <a class="reference internal" href="general/controllers.html"><span class="doc">into
3915  sub-folders</span></a>. Kudos to Marco for
3916  suggesting this (and the next two) feature.</li>
3917  <li>Added regular expressions support for <a class="reference internal" href="general/routing.html"><span class="doc">routing
3918  rules</span></a>.</li>
3919  <li>Added the ability to <a class="reference internal" href="general/controllers.html"><span class="doc">remap function
3920  calls</span></a> within your controllers.</li>
3921  <li>Added the ability to <a class="reference internal" href="general/core_classes.html"><span class="doc">replace core system
3922  classes</span></a> with your own classes.</li>
3923  <li>Added support for % character in URL.</li>
3924  <li>Added the ability to supply full URLs using the
3925  <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/url_helper.html"><span class="doc">anchor()</span></a> helper function.</li>
3926  <li>Added mode parameter to <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/file_helper.html"><span class="doc">file_write()</span></a>
3927  helper.</li>
3928  <li>Added support for changing the port number in the <a class="reference internal" href="database/configuration.html"><span class="doc">Postgres
3929  driver</span></a>.</li>
3930  <li>Moved the list of “allowed URI characters” out of the Router class
3931  and into the config file.</li>
3932  <li>Moved the MIME type array out of the Upload class and into its own
3933  file in the application/config/ folder.</li>
3934  <li>Updated the Upload class to allow the upload field name to be set
3935  when calling <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/file_uploading.html"><span class="doc">do_upload()</span></a>.</li>
3936  <li>Updated the <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/config.html"><span class="doc">Config Library</span></a> to be able to
3937  load config files silently, and to be able to assign config files to
3938  their own index (to avoid collisions if you use multiple config
3939  files).</li>
3940  <li>Updated the URI Protocol code to allow more options so that URLs will
3941  work more reliably in different environments.</li>
3942  <li>Updated the form_open() helper to allow the GET method to be used.</li>
3943  <li>Updated the MySQLi execute() function with some code to help prevent
3944  lost connection errors.</li>
3945  <li>Updated the SQLite Driver to check for object support before
3946  attempting to return results as objects. If unsupported it returns an
3947  array.</li>
3948  <li>Updated the Models loader function to allow multiple loads of the
3949  same model.</li>
3950  <li>Updated the MS SQL driver so that single quotes are escaped.</li>
3951  <li>Updated the Postgres and ODBC drivers for better compatibility.</li>
3952  <li>Removed a strtolower() call that was changing URL segments to lower
3953  case.</li>
3954  <li>Removed some references that were interfering with PHP 4.4.1
3955  compatibility.</li>
3956  <li>Removed backticks from Postgres class since these are not needed.</li>
3957  <li>Renamed display() to _display() in the Output class to make it clear
3958  that it’s a private function.</li>
3959  <li>Deprecated the hash() function due to a naming conflict with a native
3960  PHP function with the same name. Please use dohash() instead.</li>
3961  <li>Fixed an bug that was preventing the input class from unsetting GET
3962  variables.</li>
3963  <li>Fixed a router bug that was making it too greedy when matching end
3964  segments.</li>
3965  <li>Fixed a bug that was preventing multiple discrete database calls.</li>
3966  <li>Fixed a bug in which loading a language file was producing a “file
3967  contains no data” message.</li>
3968  <li>Fixed a session bug caused by the XSS Filtering feature inadvertently
3969  changing the case of certain words.</li>
3970  <li>Fixed some missing prefixes when using the database prefix feature.</li>
3971  <li>Fixed a typo in the Calendar class (cal_november).</li>
3972  <li>Fixed a bug in the form_checkbox() helper.</li>
3973  <li>Fixed a bug that was allowing the second segment of the URI to be
3974  identical to the class name.</li>
3975  <li>Fixed an evaluation bug in the database initialization function.</li>
3976  <li>Fixed a minor bug in one of the error messages in the language class.</li>
3977  <li>Fixed a bug in the date helper timespan function.</li>
3978  <li>Fixed an undefined variable in the DB Driver class.</li>
3979  <li>Fixed a bug in which dollar signs used as binding replacement values
3980  in the DB class would be treated as RegEx back-references.</li>
3981  <li>Fixed a bug in the set_hash() function which was preventing MD5 from
3982  being used.</li>
3983  <li>Fixed a couple bugs in the Unit Testing class.</li>
3984  <li>Fixed an incorrectly named variable in the Validation class.</li>
3985  <li>Fixed an incorrectly named variable in the URI class.</li>
3986  <li>Fixed a bug in the config class that was preventing the base URL from
3987  being called properly.</li>
3988  <li>Fixed a bug in the validation class that was not permitting callbacks
3989  if the form field was empty.</li>
3990  <li>Fixed a problem that was preventing scaffolding from working properly
3991  with MySQLi.</li>
3992  <li>Fixed some MS SQL bugs.</li>
3993  <li>Fixed some doc typos.</li>
3994  </ul>
3995  </div>
3996  <div class="section" id="version-1-3-3">
3997  <h2>Version 1.3.3<a class="headerlink" href="#version-1-3-3" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
3998  <p>Release Date: June 1, 2006</p>
3999  <ul class="simple">
4000  <li>Models do <strong>not</strong> connect automatically to the database as of this
4001  version. <a class="reference internal" href="general/models.html"><span class="doc">More info here</span></a>.</li>
4002  <li>Updated the Sessions class to utilize the active record class when
4003  running session related queries. Previously the queries assumed MySQL
4004  syntax.</li>
4005  <li>Updated alternator() function to re-initialize when called with no
4006  arguments, allowing multiple calls.</li>
4007  <li>Fixed a bug in the active record “having” function.</li>
4008  <li>Fixed a problem in the validation class which was making checkboxes
4009  be ignored when required.</li>
4010  <li>Fixed a bug in the word_limiter() helper function. It was cutting
4011  off the fist word.</li>
4012  <li>Fixed a bug in the xss_clean function due to a PHP bug that affects
4013  some versions of html_entity_decode.</li>
4014  <li>Fixed a validation bug that was preventing rules from being set twice
4015  in one controller.</li>
4016  <li>Fixed a calendar bug that was not letting it use dynamically loaded
4017  languages.</li>
4018  <li>Fixed a bug in the active record class when using WHERE clauses with
4019  LIKE</li>
4020  <li>Fixed a bug in the hash() security helper.</li>
4021  <li>Fixed some typos.</li>
4022  </ul>
4023  </div>
4024  <div class="section" id="version-1-3-2">
4025  <h2>Version 1.3.2<a class="headerlink" href="#version-1-3-2" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
4026  <p>Release Date: April 17, 2006</p>
4027  <ul class="simple">
4028  <li>Changed the behavior of the validation class such that if a
4029  “required” rule is NOT explicitly stated for a field then all other
4030  tests get ignored.</li>
4031  <li>Fixed a bug in the Controller class that was causing it to look in
4032  the local “init” folder instead of the main system one.</li>
4033  <li>Fixed a bug in the init_pagination file. The $config item was not
4034  being set correctly.</li>
4035  <li>Fixed a bug in the auto typography helper that was causing
4036  inconsistent behavior.</li>
4037  <li>Fixed a couple bugs in the Model class.</li>
4038  <li>Fixed some documentation typos and errata.</li>
4039  </ul>
4040  </div>
4041  <div class="section" id="version-1-3-1">
4042  <h2>Version 1.3.1<a class="headerlink" href="#version-1-3-1" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
4043  <p>Release Date: April 11, 2006</p>
4044  <ul class="simple">
4045  <li>Added a <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/unit_testing.html"><span class="doc">Unit Testing Library</span></a>.</li>
4046  <li>Added the ability to pass objects to the <strong>insert()</strong> and
4047  <strong>update()</strong> database functions. This feature enables you to (among
4048  other things) use your <a class="reference internal" href="general/models.html"><span class="doc">Model class</span></a>
4049  variables to run queries with. See the Models page for details.</li>
4050  <li>Added the ability to pass objects to the <a class="reference internal" href="general/views.html"><span class="doc">view loading
4051  function</span></a>: $this-&gt;load-&gt;view(‘my_view’,
4052  $object);</li>
4053  <li>Added getwhere function to <a class="reference internal" href="database/query_builder.html"><span class="doc">Active Record
4054  class</span></a>.</li>
4055  <li>Added count_all function to <a class="reference internal" href="database/query_builder.html"><span class="doc">Active Record
4056  class</span></a>.</li>
4057  <li>Added language file for scaffolding and fixed a scaffolding bug that
4058  occurs when there are no rows in the specified table.</li>
4059  <li>Added <a class="reference internal" href="database/queries.html"><span class="doc">$this-&gt;db-&gt;last_query()</span></a>, which
4060  allows you to view your last query that was run.</li>
4061  <li>Added a new mime type to the upload class for better compatibility.</li>
4062  <li>Changed how cache files are read to prevent PHP errors if the cache
4063  file contains an XML tag, which PHP wants to interpret as a short
4064  tag.</li>
4065  <li>Fixed a bug in a couple of the active record functions (where and
4066  orderby).</li>
4067  <li>Fixed a bug in the image library when realpath() returns false.</li>
4068  <li>Fixed a bug in the Models that was preventing libraries from being
4069  used within them.</li>
4070  <li>Fixed a bug in the “exact_length” function of the validation class.</li>
4071  <li>Fixed some typos in the user guide</li>
4072  </ul>
4073  </div>
4074  <div class="section" id="version-1-3">
4075  <h2>Version 1.3<a class="headerlink" href="#version-1-3" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
4076  <p>Release Date: April 3, 2006</p>
4077  <ul class="simple">
4078  <li>Added support for <a class="reference internal" href="general/models.html"><span class="doc">Models</span></a>.</li>
4079  <li>Redesigned the database libraries to support additional RDBMs
4080  (Postgres, MySQLi, etc.).</li>
4081  <li>Redesigned the <a class="reference internal" href="database/query_builder.html"><span class="doc">Active Record class</span></a>
4082  to enable more varied types of queries with simpler syntax, and
4083  advanced features like JOINs.</li>
4084  <li>Added a feature to the database class that lets you run <a class="reference internal" href="database/call_function.html"><span class="doc">custom
4085  function calls</span></a>.</li>
4086  <li>Added support for <a class="reference internal" href="general/controllers.html"><span class="doc">private functions</span></a> in your
4087  controllers. Any controller function name that starts with an
4088  underscore will not be served by a URI request.</li>
4089  <li>Added the ability to pass your own initialization parameters to your
4090  <a class="reference internal" href="general/creating_libraries.html"><span class="doc">custom core libraries</span></a> when using
4091  $this-&gt;load-&gt;library()</li>
4092  <li>Added support for running standard <a class="reference internal" href="general/urls.html"><span class="doc">query string URLs</span></a>.
4093  These can be optionally enabled in your config file.</li>
4094  <li>Added the ability to <a class="reference internal" href="general/urls.html"><span class="doc">specify a “suffix”</span></a>, which will be
4095  appended to your URLs. For example, you could add .html to your URLs,
4096  making them appear static. This feature is enabled in your config
4097  file.</li>
4098  <li>Added a new error template for use with native PHP errors.</li>
4099  <li>Added “alternator” function in the <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/string_helper.html"><span class="doc">string
4100  helpers</span></a>.</li>
4101  <li>Removed slashing from the input class. After much debate we decided
4102  to kill this feature.</li>
4103  <li>Change the commenting style in the scripts to the PEAR standard so
4104  that IDEs and tools like phpDocumenter can harvest the comments.</li>
4105  <li>Added better class and function name-spacing to avoid collisions with
4106  user developed classes. All CodeIgniter classes are now prefixed with
4107  CI_ and all controller methods are prefixed with _ci to avoid
4108  controller collisions. A list of reserved function names can be
4109  <a class="reference internal" href="general/controllers.html"><span class="doc">found here</span></a>.</li>
4110  <li>Redesigned how the “CI” super object is referenced, depending on
4111  whether PHP 4 or 5 is being run, since PHP 5 allows a more graceful
4112  way to manage objects that utilizes a bit less resources.</li>
4113  <li>Deprecated: $this-&gt;db-&gt;use_table() has been deprecated. Please read
4114  the <a class="reference internal" href="database/query_builder.html"><span class="doc">Active Record</span></a> page for
4115  information.</li>
4116  <li>Deprecated: $this-&gt;db-&gt;smart_escape_str() has been deprecated.
4117  Please use this instead: $this-&gt;db-&gt;escape()</li>
4118  <li>Fixed a bug in the exception handler which was preventing some PHP
4119  errors from showing up.</li>
4120  <li>Fixed a typo in the URI class. $this-&gt;total_segment() should be
4121  plural: $this-&gt;total_segments()</li>
4122  <li>Fixed some typos in the default calendar template</li>
4123  <li>Fixed some typos in the user guide</li>
4124  </ul>
4125  </div>
4126  <div class="section" id="version-1-2">
4127  <h2>Version 1.2<a class="headerlink" href="#version-1-2" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
4128  <p>Release Date: March 21, 2006</p>
4129  <ul class="simple">
4130  <li>Redesigned some internal aspects of the framework to resolve scoping
4131  problems that surfaced during the beta tests. The problem was most
4132  notable when instantiating classes in your constructors, particularly
4133  if those classes in turn did work in their constructors.</li>
4134  <li>Added a global function named
4135  <a class="reference internal" href="general/ancillary_classes.html"><span class="doc">get_instance()</span></a> allowing the main
4136  CodeIgniter object to be accessible throughout your own classes.</li>
4137  <li>Added new <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/file_helper.html"><span class="doc">File Helper</span></a>:
4138  delete_files()</li>
4139  <li>Added new <a class="reference internal" href="helpers/url_helper.html"><span class="doc">URL Helpers</span></a>: base_url(),
4140  index_page()</li>
4141  <li>Added the ability to create your own <a class="reference internal" href="general/creating_libraries.html"><span class="doc">core
4142  libraries</span></a> and store them in your local
4143  application directory.</li>
4144  <li>Added an overwrite option to the <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/file_uploading.html"><span class="doc">Upload
4145  class</span></a>, enabling files to be
4146  overwritten rather than having the file name appended.</li>
4147  <li>Added Javascript Calendar plugin.</li>
4148  <li>Added search feature to user guide. Note: This is done using Google,
4149  which at the time of this writing has not crawled all the pages of
4150  the docs.</li>
4151  <li>Updated the parser class so that it allows tag pars within other tag
4152  pairs.</li>
4153  <li>Fixed a bug in the DB “where” function.</li>
4154  <li>Fixed a bug that was preventing custom config files to be
4155  auto-loaded.</li>
4156  <li>Fixed a bug in the mysql class bind feature that prevented question
4157  marks in the replacement data.</li>
4158  <li>Fixed some bugs in the xss_clean function</li>
4159  </ul>
4160  </div>
4161  <div class="section" id="version-beta-1-1">
4162  <h2>Version Beta 1.1<a class="headerlink" href="#version-beta-1-1" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
4163  <p>Release Date: March 10, 2006</p>
4164  <ul class="simple">
4165  <li>Added a <a class="reference internal" href="libraries/calendar.html"><span class="doc">Calendaring class</span></a>.</li>
4166  <li>Added support for running <a class="reference internal" href="general/managing_apps.html"><span class="doc">multiple
4167  applications</span></a> that share a common CodeIgniter
4168  backend.</li>
4169  <li>Moved the “uri protocol” variable from the index.php file into the
4170  config.php file</li>
4171  <li>Fixed a problem that was preventing certain function calls from
4172  working within constructors.</li>
4173  <li>Fixed a problem that was preventing the $this-&gt;load-&gt;library function
4174  from working in constructors.</li>
4175  <li>Fixed a bug that occurred when the session class was loaded using the
4176  auto-load routine.</li>
4177  <li>Fixed a bug that can happen with PHP versions that do not support the
4178  E_STRICT constant</li>
4179  <li>Fixed a data type error in the form_radio function (form helper)</li>
4180  <li>Fixed a bug that was preventing the xss_clean function from being
4181  called from the validation class.</li>
4182  <li>Fixed the cookie related config names, which were incorrectly
4183  specified as $conf rather than $config</li>
4184  <li>Fixed a pagination problem in the scaffolding.</li>
4185  <li>Fixed a bug in the mysql class “where” function.</li>
4186  <li>Fixed a regex problem in some code that trimmed duplicate slashes.</li>
4187  <li>Fixed a bug in the br() function in the HTML helper</li>
4188  <li>Fixed a syntax mistake in the form_dropdown function in the Form
4189  Helper.</li>
4190  <li>Removed the “style” attributes form the form helpers.</li>
4191  <li>Updated the documentation. Added “next/previous” links to each page
4192  and fixed various typos.</li>
4193  </ul>
4194  </div>
4195  <div class="section" id="version-beta-1-0">
4196  <h2>Version Beta 1.0<a class="headerlink" href="#version-beta-1-0" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
4197  <p>Release Date: February 28, 2006</p>
4198  <p>First publicly released version.</p>
4199  </div>
4200  </div>
4201  
4202  
4203            </div>
